CHIRRUT ÎMWE: May the Force of others be with you. May the Force of others be with you.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Wait for me.

Cassian walks off, leaving Jyn standing there.

CHIRRUT ÎMWE: May the Force of others be with you. May the Force of others be with you.

CHIRRUT ÎMWE: Would you trade that necklace for a glimpse into your future? (Jyn turns around and comes closer, alarmed and interested). Yes, I’m speaking to you. I am Chirrut Îmwe.

JYN ERSO: How did you know I was wearing a necklace?

CHIRRUT ÎMWE: For that answer you must pay. What do you know of kyber crystals?

JYN ERSO: My father, he said they powered the Jedi lightsabers.

Cassian returns and finds her talking to Chirrut.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Jyn. Come on, let’s go.

CHIRRUT ÎMWE: The strongest stars have hearts of kyber.

Cassian pulls Jyn away as Chirrut speaks.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Let’s go. We’re not here to make friends.

JYN ERSO: Who are they?

CASSIAN ANDOR: The Guardians of the Whills. Protectors of the Kyber Temple. But there’s nothing left to protect, so now they’re just causing trouble for everybody.

JYN ERSO: You seem awfully tense all of a sudden.

CASSIAN ANDOR: We have to hurry. This town, it’s ready to blow.

Cassian and Jyn push quickly throught the crowd when they notice a heavily guarded Imperial transport move along the street. Jyn looks up to see armed people waiting on the roofs and several more hiding in the pathways next to the main street. She looks at Cassian nervously.

STORMTROOPER 1: Citizens of the Empire, Imperial forces...

A partisan throws a thermal detonator underneath the tank accompanying the transport. The tank explodes and Partisans begin fighting the stormtroopers. Chaos begins as people run away and firing begins. Jyn and Cassian hide behind a wall, blasters ready.

JYN ERSO: Tell me you have a backup plan.

STORMTROOPER 1: Incoming!

STORMTROOPER 2: Put your guns down.

STORMTROOPER 1: Behind us!

JYN ERSO: Looks like we found Saw’s rebels.

Jyn sees a small child standing under a tall tower, crying. She runs to save her and covers her with her body as the two fall to the ground. A partisan shoots the stormtroopers from the top of the tower.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Jyn, no!

The child’s mother quickly arrives and takes her daughter.

MOTHER: Thank you.

STORMTROOPER: Hit the tower!

CITIZEN: Get out of there!

A stormtrooper aims a rocket at the tower and fires. Jyn barely makes it out and runs to cover. Next to the ruins of the tank, partisans gather to take out something from the transport.

PARTISAN: Quickly, the kyber, get it. Here, take the kyber. Take the kyber. Come on!

CASSIAN ANDOR: This way!

They are surprised by an Imperial droid that looks exactly like K-2SO. Jyn shoots it and it falls to the ground. K-2SO walks out from behind it. K-2SO looks startled.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: Did you know that wasn’t me?

JYN ERSO: Of course!

CASSIAN ANDOR: I thought I told you to stay on the ship.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: You did, but I thought it was boring, and you were in trouble. There are a lot of explosions for two people blending in.

A grenade sails towards K-2SO, but he catches it without looking and throws it backwards towards a group of stormtroopers.

STORMTROOPER: Freeze right there...

The grenade explodes, killing the entire squad of stormtroopers. Jyn and Cassian exchange looks.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: You’re right, I should just wait on the ship.

Cassian, Jyn and K-2SO walk into a clearing with multiple stormtroopers.

STORMTROOPER: Halt! Stop right there!

STORMTROOPER: Where are you taking these prisoners?

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: These are prisoners.

STORMTROOPER: Yes. Where are you taking them?

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: I am taking them... to imprison them. In prison.

CASSIAN ANDOR: He’s taking us to...

K-2SO slaps Cassian.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: Quiet! And there’s a fresh one if you mouth off again!

STORMTROOPER: We’ll take them from here.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: That’s okay. If you could just point me in the right direction, I can take them, I’m sure. I’ve taken them this far…

The stormtroopers grab Jyn and Cassian and cuff them to take them away. The two struggle to break free.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Hey, wait a second.

STORMTROOPER: Take them away.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: Wait!

STORMTROOPER: Hey, droid. You can’t take them away! You stay here. We need to check your diagnostics.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: Diagnostics? I’m capable of running my own diagnostics, thank you very much.

Chirrut emerges from a doorway, drawing the attention of stormtroopers, and walks towards them, tapping his staff on the ground.

CHIRRUT ÎMWE: Let them pass in peace! Let them pass in peace. The Force is with me, and I am with the Force. And I fear nothing, for all is as the Force wills it.

STORMTROOPER 1: Hey! Stop right there!

STORMTROOPER 2: He’s blind.

STORMTROOPER 1: Is he deaf?

STORMTROOPER 2: I said: Stop right there!

Chirrut stops, listening closely to the stormtroopers’ movements. As they begin firing, he waits for the right moment and springs into action, easily beating up the stormtroopers. He is impossible to hit and dodges every shot directed at him, covering himself with other

CHIRRUT ÎMWE: Is your foot all right?

Chirrut knocks down the last stormtrooper, but many more surround him. Suddenly, rapid blaster fire kills all the stormtroopers. It has come from Chirrut’s friend, Baze Malbus.

CHIRRUT ÎMWE: You almost shot me.

BAZE MALBUS: You’re welcome.

Cassian, Jyn and K-2SO emerge from a hiding spot.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: Clear of hostiles!

Baze aims his blaster at K-2SO at the sight of an Imperial droid.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: One hostile!

Jyn jumps out in front of K-2SO with her arms in the air.

JYN ERSO: He’s with us!

CHIRRUT ÎMWE: They’re all right.

K-2SO removes their handcuffs.

JYN ERSO: Thanks.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: Cassian, I’m sorry about the slap.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Go back to the ship. Wait for my call. 

K-2SO leaves obediently. Cassian turns to Baze, rubbing his wrists. 

CASSIAN ANDOR: Is he a Jedi?

BAZE MALBUS: There are no Jedi here anymore. Only dreamers like this fool.

CHIRRUT ÎMWE: The Force did protect me.

BAZE ÎMWE: I protected you.

JYN ERSO: Can you get us to Saw Gerrera?

CHIRRUT ÎMWE: Can’t you see we are no friends of the Empire?

The Partisans suddenly surround the group. The rebels are disarmed and handcuffed again.

EDRIO TWO TUBES: Tell that to the one who killed our men.

JYN ERSO: Anyone who kills me or my friends will answer to Saw Gerrera.

EDRIO TWO TUBES: And why Is that?

JYN ERSO: Because I am the daughter of Galen Erso.

EDRIO TWO TUBES: Take them!

Sacks are put over everyone’s heads.

CHIRRUT ÎMWE: Are you kidding me? I’m blind!

INT. PARTISAN BASE (Inside the prison cells in the Partisan base.)

Chirrut, Baze and Cassian are thrown into a cell all together. In the next cell is Bodhi Rook, silently staring into space.

CHIRRUT ÎMWE: I’m one with the Force and the Force is with me. I’m one with the Force and the Force is with me.

BAZE MALBUS: You pray?

CHIRRUT ÎMWE: I’m one with the Force and the Force is with me.

BAZE MALBUS: Really?

CHIRRUT ÎMWE: I’m one with the Force and the Force is with me.

BAZE MALBUS: He’s praying for the door to open.

CHIRRUT ÎMWE: It bothers him, because he knows it is possible. Baze Malbus was once the most devoted Guardian of us all.

CASSIAN ANDOR: I’m beginning to think the Force and I have different priorities.

BAZE MALBUS: Relax, Captain. We’ve been in worse cages than this one.

CASSIAN ANDOR: This is a first for me.

CHIRRUT ÎMWE: There is more than one sort of prison, Captain, I sense that you carry yours wherever you go.

Outside of the prison, Jyn is taken to meet Saw Gerrera in his command room.

SAW GERRERA: Jyn. Is it really you? I can’t believe it.

JYN ERSO: Must be quite a surprise.

SAW GERRERA: Are we not still friends?

JYN ERSO: The last time I saw you, you gave me a knife and loaded blaster and told me to wait in a bunker until daylight.

SAW GERRERA: I knew you were safe.

JYN ERSO: You left me behind.

SAW GERRERA: You were already the best soldier in my cadre.

JYN ERSO: I was sixteen.

SAW GERRERA: I was protecting you!

JYN ERSO: You dumped me!

SAW GERRERA: You were the daughter of an Imperial science officer! People were starting to figure that out. People who wanted to- to use you as a hostage. Not a day goes by that I don’t think of you. But today, of all days? It’s a trap, isn’t it?

JYN ERSO: What?

SAW GERRERA: The pilot! The message. All of it. Did they... send you? Did you come here to kill me? There’s not much of me left.

JYN ERSO: The Alliance wants my father. They think he’s sent you a message about a weapon. I guess they think by sending me you might actually help them out.

SAW GERRERA: So what is it that you want, Jyn?

JYN ERSO: They wanted an introduction, they’ve got it. I’m out now. The rest of you can do what you want.

SAW GERRERA: You care not about the cause?

JYN ERSO: The cause? Seriously? The Alliance? The... The rebels? Whatever it is you’re calling yourself these days? All it’s ever brought me is pain.

SAW GERRERA: You can stand to see the Imperial flag reign across the galaxy?

JYN ERSO: It’s not a problem if you don’t look up.

SAW GERRERA: I have something to show you, come.

The two walk towards a holopad lying on the floor.

Switches to shot of Jedha City. The Star Destroyer is seen leaving the city, followed by numerous TIE fighters and smaller craft. The citizens look up in surprise as they hear its engines whirring to life.

INT. DEATH STAR (On the Death Star)

Grand Moff Tarkin and Director Krennic stand in the control room in front of a giant screen with the city of Jedha pictured on it.

GRAND MOFF WILHUFF TARKIN: The Emperor is awaiting my report.

DIRECTOR ORSON KRENNIC: One had hoped that he and Lord Vader might have been here for such an occasion.

GRAND MOFF WILHUFF TARKIN: And I thought it prudent to save you from any potential embarrassment.

DIRECTOR ORSON KRENNIC: Your concern is hardly warranted.

GRAND MOFF WILHUFF TARKIN: If saying it would only make it so.

DIRECTOR ORSON KRENNIC: All Imperial forces have been evacuated, and I stand ready to destroy the entire moon.

GRAND MOFF WILHUFF TARKIN: That won’t be necessary. We need a statement, not a manifesto. The Holy City will be enough for the day.

KRENNIC: Target Jedha City, prepare single reactor ignition.

Gunners get in their positions and prepare to fire.

CAPTAIN DUNSTIG PTERRO: Sir, we’re in position, ready to...

DIRECTOR ORSON KRENNIC: Fire!

Pterro walks off to give the command to his officers.

CAPTAIN DUNSTIG PTERRO: Commence primary ignition.

INT. PARTISAN BASE (In the Partisan prison)

CHIRRUT ÎMWE: Who’s the one in the next cell?

CASSIAN ANDOR: What? Where?

Baze looks through the hole in the wall and sees Bodhi.

BAZE MALBUS: An Imperial pilot.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Pilot?

BAZE MALBUS: I’m going to kill him!

Baze starts trying to break the bars separating the two cells.

CASSIAN ANDOR: No, no, no, wait!

BAZE MALBUS: Come here!

CASSIAN ANDOR: NO!

BAZE MALBUS: Back off. Back off.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Okay.

Cassian tries to talk to Bodhi in a calmer voice, but Bodhi keeps staring into space and mumbling.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Are you the pilot? Hey, hey are you the pilot? The shuttle pilot? Pilot?

CHIRRUT ÎMWE: What’s wrong with him?

CASSIAN ANDOR: Galen Erso. You know that name?

BODHI ROOK: I brought the message, I’m the pilot. I’m the pilot. I’m the pilot.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Okay, good. Now where is Galen Erso?

INT. DEATH STAR (On the Death Star)

GUNNER: Standby.

The camera pans to show levers being pulled. A gunner raises his hand and drops it as a signal. A bright array of lights comes on across the control panel. The Death Star eclipses the sun over Jedha. A blinding green ray emerges from the reactor as two gunners manning it turn away to cover their eyes.

INT. PARTISAN BASE (In the Partisan base)

SAW GERRERA: This is the message I was sent.

The holoprojector lights up and a hologram of Galen Erso appears.

GALEN ERSO: Saw, if you’re watching this, then perhaps there is a chance to save the Alliance. Perhaps there’s a chance to explain myself and, though I don’t dare hope for too much, a chance for Jyn, if she’s alive, if you can possibly find her to let her know that my love for her has never faded and how desperately I’ve missed her. Jyn, my Stardust, I can’t imagine what you think of me. When I was taken, I faced some bitter truths. I was told that, soon enough, Krennic would have you as well. As time went by, I knew that you were either dead or so well hidden that he would never find you. I knew if I refused to work, if I took my own life, it would only be a matter of time before Krennic realized he no longer needed me to complete the project. So I did the one thing that nobody expected: I lied. I learned to lie. I played the part of a beaten man resigned to the sanctuary of his work. I made myself indispensable, and all the while I laid the groundwork of my revenge. We call it the Death Star. There is no better name. And the day is coming soon when it will be unleashed. I’ve placed a weakness deep within the system. A flaw so small and powerful, they’ll never find it. But, Jyn. Jyn, if you’re listening My beloved, so much of my life has been wasted. I try to think of you only in the moments when I’m strong, because the pain of not having you with me Your mother. Our family. The pain of that loss is so overwhelming I risk failing even now. It’s just so hard not to think of you. Think of where you are. My Stardust. Saw, the reactor module, that’s the key. That’s the place I’ve laid my trap. It’s well hidden and unstable, one blast to any part of it will destroy the entire station.

The Death Star blasts the Holy City of Jedha, vaporising it in an instant.

GALEN ERSO: You’ll need the plans, the structural plans for the Death Star to find the reactor. I know there’s a complete engineering archive in the data vault at the Citadel Tower on Scarif. Any pressurized explosion to the reactor module will set off a chain reaction that will destroy the entire station...

The hologram cuts off because of the earthquake going through the Partisan base due to the Death Star’s fire. Jyn falls to her knees, crying. The partisans guarding the cells scream and scatter, leaving the prisoners behind. The three manage to break the lock and free themselves.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Go. Go!

Cassian screams into his comlink.

CASSIAN ANDOR: K-2? K-2, where are you?

The camera reveals K-2SO in the U-Wing, staring at the explosion of Jedha. A huge earthquake is lifting rubble high into the air and the shockwave is coming closer to his location.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: There you are. I’m standing by as you requested. Although there’s a problem on the horizon. There is no horizon.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Locate our position. Bring that ship in here now!

Cassian breaks off from the group and runs off.

CHIRRUT ÎMWE: Where are you going?

CASSIAN ANDOR: I’ve got to find Jyn. Get the pilot. We need him.

BAZE MALBUS: All right. I’ll get the pilot.

Baze walks up to Bodhi's cell.

BAZE MALBUS: Pilot.

He aims his blaster at Bodhi.

BODHI ROOK: No, no, no!

He fires but the blaster hits the cell door, freeing Bodhi.

BAZE MALBUS: Let’s go.

Cassian finds Jyn with Saw in the control room. She is still on the floor, shocked by the hologram.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Jyn! We’ve got to go. I know where your father is.

SAW GERRERA: Go with him, Jyn. You must go.

JYN ERSO: Come with us.

SAW GERRERA: I will run no longer.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Come on.

JYN ERSO: But you must save yourself.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Come on.

SAW GERRERA: Go! There’s no time! Save the Rebellion! Save the dream!

Jyn and Cassian run off. Saw limps over to the window, rips his oxygen mask off and silently watches the shockwave.

INT. DEATH STAR (On the Death Star)

The staff and officers watch the giant screen in the control room as it shows them the destruction of Jedha City. Krennic looks up in awe with a distant smile.

DIRECTOR ORSON KRENNIC: Oh. It’s beautiful.

EXT. PARTISAN BASE (Outside the Partisan base)

Partisans are seen running off and screaming as the shockwave comes closer.

BAZE MALBUS: Chirrut, let’s go!

CASSIAN: Come on! Let’s get out of here!

They all pile into the U-Wing. Bodhi barely makes it on board as they close the door.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Get us out of here! Punch it!

K-2SO is at the controls, starting the hyperdrive.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: I’m not very optimistic about our odds.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Let’s not, K. Come on! Punch it.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: I haven’t completed my calculations.

CASSIAN ANDOR: I’ll make them for you.

Cassian grabs the hyperdrive lever and pulls it sharply. The U-Wing shifts into hyperspace and zips away from Jedha seconds before the rubble from the shockwave destroys the mountain.

INT. DEATH STAR (On the Death Star)

The officers talk quietly amongst themselves. Krennic walks by Tarkin, intentionally shoving him in the shoulder.

GRAND MOFF WILHUFF TARKIN: I believe I owe you an apology, Director Krennic. Your work exceeds all expectations.

DIRECTOR ORSON KRENNIC: And you’ll tell the Emperor as much?

GRAND MOFF WILHUFF TARKIN: I will tell him his patience with your misadventures has been rewarded with a weapon that will bring a swift end to the Rebellion.

DIRECTOR ORSON KRENNIC: That was only an inkling of its destructive potential.

GRAND MOFF WILHUFF TARKIN: I will tell him that I will be taking control over the weapon I first spoke of years ago, effective immediately.

Krennic's face turns into a grimace. He starts yelling at Tarkin.

DIRECTOR ORSON KRENNIC: We stand here amid my achievement, not yours!

GRAND MOFF WILHUFF TARKIN: I’m afraid these recent security breaches have laid bare your inadequacies as a military director.

DIRECTOR ORSON KRENNIC: The breaches have been filled, Jedha has been silenced.

GRAND MOFF WILHUFF TARKIN: You think this pilot acted alone? He was dispatched from the installation on Eadu. Galen Erso’s facility.

DIRECTOR ORSON KRENNIC: We’ll see about this.

Krennic walks off angrily, flanked by his death troopers. Tarkin turns away and pulls a smile.

INT. MASSASSII REBEL BASE (In the Rebel base on Yavin 4)

Rebel communication experts sit at a control panel when one of them receives a message. He turns to General Draven.

REBEL: A coded message from Captain Andor, sir. Weapon confirmed. Jedha destroyed. Mission target located on Eadu. Please advise.

GENERAL DAVITS DRAVEN: Destroyed? Proceed. Tell him my orders still stand. Tell him to proceed with haste and keep to the plan. We have no idea what he is building for the Empire. We have to kill Galen Erso while we have the chance.

INT. U-WING (In hyperspace, in the U-Wing.)

The group sits solemnly in the U-Wing.

CHIRRUT ÎMWE: Baze, tell me. All of it? The whole city? Tell me.

BODHI ROOK: All of it.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Understood. Set a course for Eadu.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: Setting course for Eadu.

JYN ERSO: Is that where my father is?

CASSIAN ANDOR: I think so.

BODHI ROOK: So you’re Galen’s daughter.

JYN ERSO: You know him?

BODHI ROOK: I’m Bodhi, the pilot.

JYN ERSO: You brought the message.

BODHI ROOK: Yes, your father... He said I could get right by myself. He said I could make it right, if I was brave enough and listened to what was in my heart. Do something about it. Guess it was too late.

JYN ERSO: It wasn’t too late.

BODHI ROOK: Seems pretty late to me.

JYN ERSO: No. We can beat the people who did this. My father’s message, I’ve seen it.They call it the Death Star. But they have no idea there’s a way to defeat it. You’re wrong about my father.

CASSIAN ANDOR: He did build it.

JYN ERSO: Because he knew they’d do it without him. My father made a choice. He sacrificed himself for the Rebellion. He’s rigged a trap inside it. That’s why he sent you. To bring that message.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Where is it? Where’s the message?

JYN ERSO: It was a hologram.

CASSIAN ANDOR: You have that message, right?

JYN ERSO: Everything happened so fast.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Did you see it?

JYN ERSO: You don’t believe me.

CASSIAN ANDOR: I’m not the one you’ve got to convince.

CHIRRUT ÎMWE: I believe her.

CASSIAN ANDOR: That’s good to know.

BAZE MALBUS: What kind of trap? You said your father made a trap.

JYN ERSO: The reactor. He’s placed a weakness there. He’s been hiding it for years. He said if you can blow the reactor- the module- the whole system goes down. You need to send word to the Alliance.

CASSIAN ANDOR: I’ve done that.

JYN ERSO: They have to know there’s a way to destroy this thing. They have to go to Scarif to get the plans.

CASSIAN ANDOR: I can’t risk sending that. We’re in the heart of Imperial territory.

JYN ERSO: Then we’ll find him. And bring him back, and he can tell them himself.

INT. DEATH STAR (On the Death Star)

Krennic stands next to Pterro, visibly nervous.

CAPTAIN DUNSTIG PTERRO: Course set for Eadu, sir.

EADU: IMPERIAL RESEARCH FACILITY

The U-Wing flies carefully through the rainy, dark canyons of Eadu. Cassian and K-2SO pilot the ship, dodging constantly to avoid crashing.

CHIRRUT ÎMWE: I’m one with the Force and the Force is with me.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: 20 degrees to the right. 10 degrees up.

BODHI ROOK: No, no, no, lower. Lower!

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: Are you sure this is the way?

BODHI ROOK: They have landing trackers. They have patrol squadrons. You’ve got to stay in the canyon, keep it low.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Watch your right!

The U-Wing manoeuvres carefully between the canyons, barely avoiding a collision with a cliff.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: There’s a 26% chance of failure.

CASSIAN ANDOR: How much farther?

BODHI ROOK: I don’t know. I’m not sure, I never really come this way, but we’re close, we’re close. I know that.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: Well, now there’s a 35% chance of failure.

BODHI ROOK: I don’t want to know, thank you.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: I understand.

BODHI ROOK: Now! Put it down now!

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: The wind...

BODHI ROOK: If you keep going, you’ll be right over the shuttle depot. Watch out!

The U-Wing hits its engine on a rock and the ship begins to fall.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: Hey!

CASSIAN ANDOR: Hold on tight! We’re coming down hard!

The U-Wing lands roughly in a dark canyon. A ridge separates them from the bright lights of the Imperial facility.

INT. MASSASSII REBEL BASE (On Yavin 4)

Draven and a rebel try to contact Cassian, but there's no signal. Draven slaps his hand on the table impatiently.

GENERAL DAVITS DRAVEN: Try them again.

REBEL: I am, sir. We... The signal’s gone dead.

GENERAL DAVITS DRAVEN: Squadron up, target Eadu.

EADU (On Eadu)

The group is trying to fix the U-WIng and get it back in the air, but nothing seems to work.

BODHI ROOK: How about now, check stabilizers?

CASSIAN ANDOR: Bodhi, where’s the lab?

BODHI ROOK: The research facility?

CASSIAN ANDOR: Yeah. Where is it?

BODHI ROOK: It’s just over the ridge.

CASSIAN ANDOR: And that’s a shuttle depot straight ahead of us? You are sure of that?

BODHI ROOK: Yes. We’ll have to hope there’s still an Imperial ship left to steal.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Here’s what we’re doing. Hopefully, the storm keeps up and keeps us hidden down here. Bodhi, you’re coming with me. We’ll go up the ridge and check it out.

JYN ERSO: I’m coming with you.

CASSIAN ANDOR: No, your father’s message, we can’t risk it. You’re the messenger.

JYN ERSO: That’s ridiculous. We all got the message. Everyone here knows it.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: One blast to the reactor module and the whole system goes down. That’s how you said it. The whole system goes down.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Get to work fixing our comms! All I want to do right now is get a handle on what we’re up against.So, we’re going to go very small and very carefully up the rise and see what’s what. Let’s get out of here.

Cassian pulls up his hood and disappears in the rain.

CHIRRUT ÎMWE: Does he look like a killer?

BAZE MALBUS: No. He has the face of a friend.

JYN ERSO: Who are you talking about?

CHIRRUT ÎMWE: Captain Andor.

JYN ERSO: Why do you ask that? What do you mean, does he look like a killer?

CHIRRUT ÎMWE: The Force moves darkly near a creature that’s about to kill.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: His weapon was in the sniper configuration.

Jyn goes pale and dashes off into the rain.

EXT. ROCKY RIDGE (On a rocky ridge.)

BODHI ROOK: No, no, no... We got to go up. You can’t see much from down there. This way.

CASSIAN ANDOR: I’ll be right behind you. Come on.

The two go over the ridge overlooking the Imperial facility and Cassian looks for a good spot.

INT. U-WING (In the crashed U-Wing.)

Chirrut is about to climb out of the craft when Baze stops him.

BAZE MALBUS: Where are you going?

CHIRRUT ÎMWE: I’m going to follow Jyn. Her path is clear.

BAZE MALBUS: Alone? Good luck!

CHIRRUT ÎMWE: I don’t need luck, I have you!

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: What are they doing? If Cassian comes back, we’re leaving without them.

EXT. IMPERIAL RESEARCH FACILITY - RIDGE OVERLOOK (On a ridge overlooking the Imperial Research Facility.)

Cassian and Bodhi finally settle on the ridge and look at the facility through binoculars.

CASSIAN ANDOR: You see Erso out there?

Switches to Baze and Chirrut climbing the rocks somewhere in the area.

BAZE MALBUS: We’ve come too far.

CHIRRUT ÎMWE: Patience, my friend.

Bodhi spots

BODHI ROOK: That’s him. That’s him, Galen, in the dark suit.

A shuttle zooms overhead, showering water over the two. They duck to avoid being caught in its headlights.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Get back down there, and find us a ride out of here.

BODHI ROOK: What are you doing?

CASSIAN ANDOR: You heard me.

BODHI ROOK: You said we came up here just to have a look.

CASSIAN ANDOR: I’m here, I’m looking. Go. Hurry!

EXT. IMPERIAL RESEARCH FACILITY - LANDING PLATFORM (On the landing platform in front of the research facility.)

Krennic’s shuttle lands and he walks out, flanked by deathtroopers, heading towards a group of stormtroopers and engineers.

DIRECTOR ORSON KRENNIC: Excellent news, Galen. The battle station is complete. You must be very proud.

GALEN ERSO: Proud as I can be, Krennic.

DIRECTOR ORSON KRENNIC: Gather your engineers, I have an announcement.

Switches to a shot of Jyn running across the ridge to the giant staircase that goes up to the facility. Back on top, a group of engineers steps forward nervously.

DIRECTOR ORSON KRENNIC: Is that all of them?

GALEN ERSO: Yes.

DIRECTOR ORSON KRENNIC: Gentlemen. One of you betrayed the Empire. One of you has conspired with a pilot to send messages to the Rebellion. And I urge that traitor step forward.

The engineers whisper and murmur amongst themselves. Krennic waits. Seeing that no one replies, he gestures to his troopers.

DIRECTOR ORSON KRENNIC: Very well, I’ll consider it a group effort, then. Ready!

The deathtroopers raise their blasters.

ENGINEER 1: No.

ENGINEER 2: No, please.

DIRECTOR ORSON KRENNIC: Aim... and...

The troopers stand with their rifles aimed.

ENGINEER: No, no!

DIRECTOR ORSON KRENNIC: Fire!

Just before the shooting begins, Galen jumps in front of his engineers to stop him. Cassian watches through the scope, aiming at Galen's head, but doesn't shoot.

GALEN ERSO: Stop! Stop! Krennic, stop. It was me. It was me. They have nothing to do with it. Spare them.

Krennic pauses, looking at him, then turns to his troopers.

DIRECTOR ORSON KRENNIC: Fire!

The engineers scream and fall under the fire. Krennic slaps Galen across the face and he falls to the ground.

DIRECTOR ORSON KRENNIC: How do I know the weapon is complete?

GALEN ERSO: Let me share with you some details.

Jyn climbs the onto the platform using the ladder and throws a stormtrooper down into the abyss. Cassian watches the scene through his scope and notices her when K-2SO comes in over the comlink.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: Cassian. Cassian, can you hear me?

CASSIAN ANDOR: I’m here. You got it working.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: Affirmative yes, although we have a problem! There’s an Alliance squadron approaching.

Switches to a shot of the canyon, then pans to show an X-WIng squadron approaching the facility.

REBEL PILOT: Clear the area!

CASSIAN ANDOR: No. No, no, no! Tell them to hold up! Jyn’s on that platform!

DIRECTOR ORSON KRENNIC: Jedha. Saw Gerrera. His band of fanatics. Their Holy City. The last reminder of the Jedi. Gone.

GALEN ERSO: You’ll never win.

DIRECTOR ORSON KRENNIC: Now where have I heard that before?

K-2SO attempts to reach the rebel base to delay the attack. On Yavin 4, a rebel comms expert calls General Draven to come over.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: Relay from Captain Andor.

REBEL: General.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: Captain Andor requesting a delay on squadron support. Alliance forces onsite. Please confirm.

GENERAL DAVITS DRAVEN: Get the squadron leader on, get him on now!

REBEL: They’re already engaged, sir.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Jyn. No.

The rebel squadron begins shooting at the platform and there are several explosions. Baze stares at the attack in horror. On the platform, Krennic and his troops take cover. Jyn sneaks by, unnoticed, and hides behind a container.

DIRECTOR ORSON KRENNIC: Return fire! To your stations! Get our fighters in the air now!

In the chaos, Galen gets up and Jyn runs out towards him.

JYN ERSO: Father!

Krennic and Galen hear her at the same time and turn around. Krennic pulls out his blaster but before he can shoot, an explosion rocks the platform, knocking all three to the ground. TIE fighters burst out of hangars and engage the X-Wings. There are instantly several casualties on both sides. A few Imperial gunners are seen in an ion cannon as they shoot down a rebel craft.

STORMTROOPER 1: Go, go, go, go!

STORMTROOPER 2: Fall back! Fall back!

Captain Pterro runs up to Krennic and helps him up. They begin hurrying to the shuttle, guarded by death troopers. Switches to Chirrut Îmwe, who breathes in his hand, then pulls a bow off his shoulder, aims and fires blindly at a TIE fighter, shooting it down and directing the falling fighter at the ion cannon, which explodes in flames.

CAPTAIN DUNSTIG PTERRO: Director, we need to evacuate.

Jyn gets up slowly and runs across the burning platform to her father, who has been wounded in the explosion. She kneels by his side, but Krennic's shuttle takes off and pours water all over her. She loses her balance and slides across the platform, almost falling into a hole made by the explosions. She crawls back up and runs to her father, kneeling by his side.

JYN ERSO: Papa. Papa, it’s me. It’s Jyn.

GALEN ERSO: Jyn. Stardust.

JYN ERSO: Papa. I’ve seen your message. The hologram, I’ve seen it.

GALEN ERSO: It must be destroyed.

JYN ERSO: I know. I know. We will.

GALEN ERSO: Jyn. Look at you. I’ve so much to tell you.

He goes silent and his hand falls from hers as he closes his eyes. Jyn's eyes fill with tears.

JYN ERSO: Papa. No. No. Papa! Papa! Come on.

Stormtroopers emerge from the facility and are about to begin shooting.

STORMTROOPER: Over there, take them down.

Cassian's shots take the troopers down and he runs over to Jyn to take her away.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Come on. Jyn, we’ve got to go. Come on.

JYN ERSO: I can’t leave him.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Listen to me. He’s gone. There’s nothing you can do. Come on.

JYN ERSO: I can’t leave him.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Come on! Help me. Move!

More stormtroopers appear and the pair ducks into cover as the stormtroopers are mowed down by Baze.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Down!

CASSIAN ANDOR: Come on. Come on.

Cassian and Jyn make their way to the stolen Imperial cargo shuttle that hovers in the air, taking down the stormtroopers chasing them. In the cabin, K-2SO and Bodhi pilot the shuttle.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: Well done. You’re a Rebel now.

All the rebels get into the shuttle and Bodhi helps them up the ramp.

BODHI ROOK: Let’s go, let’s go. Come on, let’s move! Come on, let’s get out of here. Move, move, move. Okay, K-2, let’s go.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: Copy that.

The shuttles takes off as the Imperial facility bursts into flames in the background. It shakes violently in the storm raging over Eadu.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Ion thrusters low until we cleared the storm.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: Understood.

Jyn walks over to Cassian inside the shuttle and confronts him.

JYN ERSO: You lied to me.

CASSIAN ANDOR: You’re in shock.

JYN ERSO: You went up there to kill my father.

CASSIAN ANDOR: You don’t know what you’re talking about.

JYN ERSO: Deny it.

CASSIAN ANDOR: You’re in shock, and looking for someplace to put it. I’ve seen it before.

JYN ERSO: I bet you have. They know. You lied about why we came here and you lied about why you went up alone.

CASSIAN ANDOR: I had every chance to pull the trigger. But did I? Did I?

JYN ERSO: You might as well have. My father was living proof and you put him at risk. Those were Alliance bombs that killed him!

CASSIAN ANDOR: I had orders. Orders that I disobeyed. But you wouldn’t understand that.

JYN ERSO: Orders? When you know they’re wrong? You might as well be a stormtrooper.

CASSIAN ANDOR: What do you know? We don’t all have the luxury of deciding when and where we want to care about something. Suddenly the Rebellion is real for you? Some of us live it. I’ve been in this fight since I was 6 years old. You’re not the only one who lost everything. Some of us just decided to do something about it.

JYN ERSO: You can’t talk your way around this.

CASSIAN ANDOR: I don’t have to. Yavin Four! Make sure they know we’re coming in with a stolen ship. Anybody else?

Switches to a shot of the planet Mustafar, following Krennic's shuttle that is heading to a pyramid-shaped building standing on the edge of a cliff with lava streaming down it. The shuttle lands on a landing platform and the camera switches to a blast door in front of which a hooded man stands. The door slides open and the man walks in to a dark room with Royal Guards by the door and a bacta tank in the center. The man, who is Vader's servant Vanee, kneels down in front of the tank.

VANEE: My lord, Director Krennic has arrived.

The bacta fluid level drops and the camera reveals Vader's body suspended in the tank. Vanee turns away as Vader begins breathing. Switches to a grand hallway in the castle. Krennic waits anxiously as the sliding door opens and Vader walks out to meet him.

DARTH VADER: Director Krennic.

DIRECTOR ORSON KRENNIC: Lord Vader.

DARTH VADER: You seem unsettled.

DIRECTOR ORSON KRENNIC: No. Just pressed for time. There’re a great many things to attend to.

DARTH VADER: My apologies. You do have a great many things to explain.

DIRECTOR ORSON KRENNIC: I’ve delivered the weapon the Emperor requested. I deserve an audience to make certain he understands its remarkable… potential.

DARTH VADER: Its power to create problems has certainly been confirmed. A city destroyed. An Imperial facility openly attacked.

DIRECTOR ORSON KRENNIC: It was Governor Tarkin that suggested the test.

DARTH VADER: You were not summoned here to grovel, Director Krennic.

DIRECTOR ORSON KRENNIC: No, it’s...

DARTH VADER: There is no Death Star. The Senate has been informed that Jedha was destroyed in a mining disaster.

DIRECTOR ORSON KRENNIC: Yes, my lord.

DARTH VADER: I expect you to not rest until you can assure the Emperor that Galen Erso has not compromised this weapon in any way.

Vader starts walking away. Krennic takes a small pause.

DIRECTOR ORSON KRENNIC: So I’m still in command? You’ll speak to the Emperor about…

He stops abruptly, grabs himself by the collar and falls to his knees, choking. Vader extends a hand and turns around.

DARTH VADER: Be careful not to choke on your aspirations, Director.

YAVIN 4

The Rebellion's war council is gathered at a large table in the command centre. Rebel senators and leaders argue while pilot squads and technicians crowd around, murmuring nervously.

SENATOR TYNNRA PAMLO: We must scatter the fleet. We have no recourse but to surrender.

BAIL ORGANA: Are we really talking about disbanding something that we’ve worked so hard to create?

ADMIRAL RADDUS: We can’t just give in.

SENATOR VASP VASPAR: We joined an Alliance, not a suicide pact!

BAIL ORGANA: We’ve only now managed to gather our forces.

SENATOR NOWER JEBEL: Gather our forces? General Draven’s already blown up an Imperial base!

GENERAL DAVITS DRAVEN: A decision needed to be made.

SENATOR TYNNRA PAMLO: If it’s war you want, you’ll fight alone!

SENATOR VASP VASPAR: If that’s the way it’s going, why have an Alliance at all?

ADMIRAL RADDUS: If she’s telling the truth, we need to act now!

SENATOR MON MOTHMA: Councilors, please!

ANTOC MERRICK: It is simple, the Empire has the means of mass destruction. The Rebellion does not.

SENATOR NOWER JEBEL: A Death Star, this is nonsense.

JYN ERSO: What reason would my father have to lie? What benefit would it bring him?

GENERAL DAVITS DRAVEN: To lure our forces into a final battle. To destroy us once and for all.

SENATOR VASP VASPAR: To risk everything, based on what? The testimony of a criminal? The dying words of her father, an Imperial scientist?

SENATOR NOWER JEBEL: Don’t forget the Imperial pilot.

JYN ERSO: My father gave his life so that we may have a chance to defeat this.

GENERAL JAN DODONNA: So you’ve told us.

SENATOR TYNNRA PAMLO: If the Empire has this kind of power, what chance do we have?

JYN ERSO: What chance do we have? The question is ‘What choice?’ Run? Hide? Plead for mercy? Scatter your forces? You give way to an enemy this evil with this much power and you condemn the galaxy to an eternity of submission. The time to fight is now!

REBEL 1: Yes!

JYN ERSO: Every moment you waste is another step closer to the ashes of Jedha.

REBEL 1: What is she proposing?

REBEL 2: Just let the girl speak!

JYN ERSO: Send your best troops to Scarif. Send the whole rebel fleet if you have to. We need to capture the Death Star plans if there is any hope of destroying it.

SENATOR TYNNRA PAMLO: You’re asking us to invade an Imperial installation based on nothing but hope?

Jyn's voice trembles and she looks like she's about to shed a tear.

JYN ERSO: Rebellions... Are built on hope.

SENATOR VASP VASPAR: There is no hope!

ADMIRAL RADDUS: I say we fight.

SENATOR NOWER JEBEL: I say the Rebellion is finished!

SENATOR MON MOTHMA: I’m sorry, Jyn. Without the full support of the council, the odds are too great.

The councilors whisper inaudibly. Bail Organa looks defeated. Jyn pushes through the crowd and leaves, followed by glances. After a momentary pause, Bodhi rushes after her. The meeting scatters, murmuring in disapproval.

In the main hangar, Jyn makes her way to Baze and Chirrut, looking angry.

DISTANT PA: General Syndulla, please report to the briefing room.

BAZE MALBUS: You don’t look happy.

JYN ERSO: They prefer to surrender.

BAZE MALBUS: And you?

CHIRRUT ÎMWE: She wants to fight.

BODHI ROOK: So do I. We all do.

CHIRRUT ÎMWE: The Force is strong.

JYN ERSO: I’m not sure four of us is quite enough.

BAZE MALBUS: How many do we need?

JYN ERSO: What are you talking about?

Cassian appears from behind her with a group of about thirty rebels.

CASSIAN ANDOR: They were never going to believe you.

JYN ERSO: I appreciate the support.

CASSIAN ANDOR: But I do. I believe you. We’d like to volunteer. Some of us... ... most of us, we’ve done terrible things on behalf of the Rebellion. We’re spies. Saboteurs. Assassins. Everything I did, I did for the Rebellion. And every time I walked away from something I wanted to forget I told myself it was for a cause that I believed in. A cause that was worth it. Without that, we’re lost. Everything we’ve done would have been for nothing. I couldn’t face myself if I gave up now. None of us could. It won’t be comfortable.

BODHI ROOK: It’ll be a bit cramped, but we’ll all fit. We could go.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Okay. Gear up. Grab anything that’s not nailed down. Go, go, go!

The rebels scatter to gather weapons and supplies. Jyn stands still with a weak smile on her face.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: Jyn. I’ll be there for you.

She smiles at him. K-2SO looks as displeased as a droid can be.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: Cassian said I had to.

JYN ERSO: I’m not used to people sticking around when things go bad.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Welcome home.

Jyn and Cassian return to the Imperial shuttle they had arrived on.

DISTANT PA: Bravo team to the Intelligence office for extraction mission report.

Once they're inside, the assembled rebel screw stands up to greet them

JYN ERSO: May the Force be with us.

There are several cheers and small applause from the team. The shuttle door closes.

FLIGHT CONTROLLER: Cargo shuttle, read back, please. What’s going on out there? That ship’s off limits. No one is suppose to be on board until farther instructions.

Jyn sits next to Bodhi, concerned and nudging him to talk to the controller.

BODHI ROOK: Yes, yes we are. Affirmative.

FLIGHT CONTROLLER: That’s an impounded Imperial ship. What’s your call sign, pilot?

BODHI ROOK: Um.

Jyn looks up at him and mouths,

JYN ERSO: We have to go.

BODHI ROOK: It-It’s um...

JYN ERSO: Say something. Come on.

BODHI ROOK: Rogue... Rogue One.

FLIGHT CONTROLLER: Rogue One? There is no Rogue One.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: Well, there is now.

BODHI ROOK: Rogue One, pulling away.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: Pulling away.

The shuttle takes off and leaves Yavin 4. Switches to a brief shot of the flight control tower with a rebel officer watching them leave. The gas giant Yavin is seen in the background. Switches to a shot of Mon Mothma and Bail Organa walking through the HQ.

SENATOR MON MOTHMA: Despite what the others say, war is inevitable.

BAIL ORGANA: Yes, I agree. I must return to Alderaan to inform my people that there will be no peace. We will need every advantage.

SENATOR MON MOTHMA: Your friend, the Jedi.

BAIL ORGANA: He served me well during the Clone Wars and has lived in hiding since the Emperor’s purge. Yes, I will send for him.

SENATOR MON MOTHMA: You’ll need someone you can trust.

BAIL ORGANA: I would trust her with my life.

He turns around and leaves, greeting captain Antilles on his way.

BAIL ORGANA: Captain Antilles, I have a mission for you.

CAPTAIN RAYMUS ANTILLES: Senator.

The shuttle sails through hyperspace with engines whooshing loudly. It jumps out of hyperspace and the camera pans to follow it across the surface of the large tropical planet of Scarif. A blockade of two Star Destroyers and a defensive shield hangs above the surface.

BODHI ROOK: Okay, we’re coming in. There’s a planetwide defensive shield with a single main entry gate. This shuttle should be equipped with an access code that allows us through.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: Assuming, the Empire hasn’t logged it as overdue.

BODHI ROOK: Or stolen.

JYN ERSO: And if they have?

BODHI ROOK: Then, they shut the gate and we’re all annihilated in the cold, dark vacuum of space.

The shuttle passes under the massive hull of a Star Destroyer.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: Not me, I can survive in space.

BODHI ROOK: Okay. Here it goes.

He contacts the shield gate via comms.

BODHI ROOK: Cargo shuttle SW-0608 requesting a landing pad.

SHIELD GATE OFFICER: Cargo shuttle SW-0608, you’re not listed on the arrival schedule.

BODHI ROOK: Acknowledged, Gate Control. We were rerouted from Eadu Flight Station. Transmitting clearance code now.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: Transmitting.

There is a tense silence as they wait for clearance. Jyn pulls out the necklace her mother gave her, smiles and closes her eyes. Cassian climbs up the ladder and looks anxiously at Bodhi.

SHIELD GATE OFFICER: Cargo shuttle SW-0608? You are cleared for entry.

Bodhi immediately lets out a relieved cry.

BODHI ROOK: Yes!

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: Impressive.

JYN ERSO: I’ll tell the others.

BODHI ROOK: Okay.

She goes down the ladder as Bodhi pilots the shuttle through the shield gate. There is an announcement of a tractor beam test in the background as they descend.

FLIGHT CONTROLLER: SW-0608 clear for landing pad 9. Acknowledge, please.

BODHI ROOK: SW-0608 proceeding to LP9 as instructed.

The shuttle gets closer to the surface and a tall pyramidal tower with a dish at the top comes into view.

CASSIAN ANDOR: The main building down there, what is it?

BODHI ROOK: That’s the Citadel Tower. They keep all the Imperial structure archives in there. If the plans are anywhere, they’ll be there.

CASSIAN ANDOR: The dish at the top? What’s it for?

BODHI ROOK: I guess it takes a lot of signals to send those data files out.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: Landing track engaged.

BODHI ROOK: Landing track locked.

Downstairs, Jyn notices the rebels silently sitting in the hold of the shuttle, all looking tense and worried. She catches Baze's eye as Cassian climbs down to make an announcement.

CASSIAN ANDOR: We’re landing. We’re coming in!

Jyn gets up, swallows, and starts speaking to lift the morale. As she begins, rebels lift their heads to listen.

JYN ERSO: Saw Gerrera used to say, one fighter with a sharp stick and nothing left to lose can take the day. They have no idea we’re coming. They have no reason to expect us. If we can make it to the ground, we’ll take the next chance. And the next. On and on until we win... or the chances are spent. The Death Star plans are down there. Cassian, K2, and I will find them. We’ll find a way to find them.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Melshi, Pao, Baze, Chirrut, you’ll take main squad, move east and get wide of the ship. Find a position between here and the tower. Once you get to the best spot, light the place up. Make ten men feel like a hundred.

BAZE MALBUS: All right.

CASSIAN ANDOR: And get those troopers away from us.

BODHI ROOK: What should I do?

CASSIAN ANDOR: Keep the engine running. You’re our only way out of here.

The shuttle finally lands on LP 9 and an inspection team of an officer, flight controller and two stormtroopers walks out to meet them.

LANDING PAD OFFICER: Cargo shuttle SW-0608, be prepared to receive inspection team.

JYN ERSO: Ready?

Bodhi opens the door to the shuttle and the inspection team sees nothing but an empty cargo hold.

LANDING PAD OFFICER: Hello.

BODHI ROOK: Hey, you’re probably looking for a manifest.

LANDING PAD OFFICER: That would be helpful.

BODHI ROOK: It’s just down here.

Bodhi smiles and points to the ladder leading downstairs.

At the same time, Krennic's shuttle emerges from hyperspace and descends into the shield gate. Krennic is on board with his bodyguards.

PILOT: Director Krennic, we are entering the Scarif shield gate. General Ramda has been informed of your arrival.

On Scarif, two rebels are seen dragging the body of a stormtrooper into the shuttle. Jyn and Cassian are putting on their disguise uniforms. Once they're done, Jyn walks out to say goodbye to the crew. She holds Chirrut's hands and he smiles. Baze puts a gentle hand on her shoulder.

BAZE MALBUS: Good luck, little sister.

They both smile softly. Cuts to Bodhi watching a few Imperials outside the shuttle. Once they turn away, he yells downstairs to the rebel crew.

BODHI ROOK: Go! Go now, you’re clear!

SERGEANT RUESCOTT MELSHI: All right, let’s go! Come on. Move, move, move!

The rebels open a hatch at the bottom of the shuttle and jump onto the ground, scattering in their assigned positions. In turn, Jyn and Cassian in Imperial disguise and K-2SO walk out of the shuttle and head towards the elevator that will take them to the facility. As the rebels disappear into the tropical forest, K-2SO, Jyn and Cassian walk into the elevator and watch the doors close.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: I have a bad feeling about…

CASSIAN ANDOR: Kay!

JYN ERSO: Quiet.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: What?

The doors close, cutting them off. The elevator slides towards the tower at the same time as Krennic's shuttle lands right next to it.

CASSIAN ANDOR: We need a map.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: Well, I’m sure there’s one just lying about.

CASSIAN ANDOR: You know what you have to do.

The elevator door opens and they walk out into a hallway of the facility, full of Imperial officers and stormtroopers. On their way they pass a droid identical to K-2SO and exchange glances when he walks by. Meanwhile, the rebel assault team is giving out thermal detonators as they watch an Imperial hangar in the distance.

SERGEANT RUESCOTT MELSHI: One per pad. Pick your spot. We want to draw them out. I’ll call the timing. Go!

Stormtroopers walk across the hangar, chatting peacefully.

STORMTROOPER 1: Hey, did you hear the rumors? 

STORMTROOPER 2: Yeah, the T-15s have been marked obsolete.

STORMTROOPER 1: Oh boy, it’s about time for that.

STORMTROOPER 2: Hey!

They don't even have time to react when Chirrut jumps out of the bushes and knocks them out with his staff, then disappears just as quickly. The rebel forces run by, unnoticed. Another stormtrooper hears someone coughing behind him and turns around to see Baze just before he is dropped to the ground. Rebels plant their detonators on the landing pads and scatter.

STORMTROOPER 1: Watch out!

STORMTROOPER 2: What the...?

The stormtrooper is electrocuted to the neck by Baze. Cuts to Krennic walking across the command centre of the tower followed by General Ramda.

GENERAL SOTORUS RAMDA: Director, what brings you to Scarif?

DIRECTOR ORSON KRENNIC: Galen Erso, I want every dispatch, every transmission he has ever sent called up for inspection.

GENERAL SOTORUS RAMDA: All of them?

DIRECTOR ORSON KRENNIC: Yes. All of them. Get started.

In the hallways of the facility, Jyn, Cassian and K-2SO are hiding in a small nook while K-2SO hacks into the Imperial droid they had noticed before. Both the droids' eyes start blinking. Cuts to the rebel group taking positions in front of the elevator entrance.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Kay?

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: Our optimal route to the data vault places only 89 stormtroopers in our path. We will make it no more than 33% of the way before we are killed.

Jyn looks up at Cassian, worried. He pulls out a comlink and contacts Melshi.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Melshi, talk to me.

SERGEANT RUESCOTT MELSHI: Ready, ready. Standing by.

Cassian looks at Jyn and she nods from behind her helmet.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Light it up.

The rebels set off their detonators and a chain reaction of explosions goes off. Stormtroopers walking by are killed instantly. Krennic, standing in the command centre, overhears the blasts and looks out the window. The officers gather around to look.

DIRECTOR ORSON KRENNIC: Are we blind?! Deploy the garrison! Move!

Krennic swallows nervously. Cuts to Jyn, Cassian and K-2 walk across a corridor when a battallion of stormtroopers runs past them and they move aside, realising the distraction worked. Inside the Rogue One shuttle, rebels spot the stormtroopers.

CORPORAL STORDAN TONC: Troopers! Troopers! Troopers on the left. Get in! Get in!

The rebels hide in the depths of the shuttle and stay hidden. The ones in cover emerge from behind the containers and start shooting the stormtroopers.

Int. DEATH STAR - Control Room

Grand Moff Tarkin stands in front of the large screen when General Romodi walks up.

GENERAL HURST ROMODI: Sir? Scarif base, they’re reporting a rebel incursion.

GRAND MOFF WILHUFF TARKIN: I want to speak to Director Krennic.

GENERAL HURST ROMODI: He’s there, sir. On Scarif.

GRAND MOFF WILHUFF TARKIN: The original plans for this station are kept there, are they not?

GENERAL HURST ROMODI: They are.

GRAND MOFF WILHUFF TARKIN: Prepare for the jump to hyperspace and inform Lord Vader.

Tarkin pulls a smirk.

Back in the facility, the trio walks into a room where an officer is at a control panel next to the archives entrance.

OFFICER: Can I help you?

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: That won’t be necessary.

K-2SO slams the officer on the head and takes control of the panel.

On Yavin 4, a rebel private runs across the whole HQ to reach Mon Mothma, Merrick and Draven, yelling.

REBEL: Senator! Senator!

Merrick grabs the soldier and stops him from reaching Mon.

GENERAL ANTOC MERRICK: Stop right there, Private!

SENATOR MON MOTHMA: Let him speak.

REBEL: Intercepted Imperial transmission, ma’am. Rebels on Scarif.

SENATOR MON MOTHMA: I need to speak to Admiral Raddus.

REBEL: He’s returned to his ship. He’s going to fight!

Back on Scarif, the rebels are engaging Imperial forces in a fierce battle. It is unclear who's winning. A rebel screams as he gets shot.

REBEL: No!

On Yavin 4, rebel crews are hurrying to their ships as an announcement rings across the PA. R2D2 and C3PO watch from the shadows of the hangar.

PA: Attention all flight personnel, please report to your commanders immediately. Attention all flight personnel, please report to your commanders immediately. We have been redirected to Scarif. Pilots, you’ll be briefed by your squadron leaders on route. May the Force be with you.

C-3PO [SEE-THREEPIO]: Scarif? They’re going to Scarif? Why does nobody ever tell me anything, Artoo?

R2-D2 [ARTOO-DETOO]: [beeps]

Melshi and his crew are still engaged in the battle.

Move, move, move!

SERGEANT RUESCOTT MELSHI: Forward! Forward!

CHIRRUT ÎMWE: Keep drawing them out!

In the control room in the tower, Imperials are panicking as they contact their landing pads. Krennic looks desperate.

IMPERIAL 1: Pad 12 report to ground. Coming at our flank, we’re outnumbered.

IMPERIAL 2: Pad 12 team, what’s going on down there? Status, please. All Pads report in immediately.

IMPERIAL 1: Oh no, we have rebels everywhere!

IMPERIAL 2: We’re taking fire! Pad 12, Pad 14 request assistance.

Bodhi takes the opportunity and directs the Imperials away with an announcement of his own.

BODHI ROOK: This is Pad 2, Pad 2. I spot 40 rebels heading west on Pad 2. Get on there, tell him pinned down by rebels on Pad 5.

CORPORAL STORDAN TONC: This is Pad 5, we’re being overrun. Help us!

IMPERIAL: Pad 12, Pad 10, Pad 8, please confirm.Confirm and report. Get reinforcements down to Pad 5 immediately!

Cassian, Jyn and K-2SO are busy trying to open the archive door.

CASSIAN ANDOR: This is not working, Kay.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: Right hand.

Jyn grabs Cassian's hand and presses it to the scanner. Immediately the door slides open. Back on the beach, Chirrut overhears a thumping noise and feels the ground shaking. He yells at Baze to turn around and he sees a massive AT-ACT emerging from the jungle and shooting at the rebel forces.

CHIRRUT ÎMWE: Baze! Baze!

BAZE MALBUS: What?

CHIRRUT ÎMWE: Run!

PAO: Karabast! AT-AT!

REBEL: Retreat! Retreat!

The rebels scatter, may falling under fire. At the same time the Rebel fleet emerges out of space over the defensive shield.

ADMIRAL RADDUS: This is Admiral Raddus of the Rebel Alliance. All Squadron leaders report in.

GENERAL ANTOC MERRICK: Admiral, this is Blue Leader standing by.

JON VANDER (GOLD LEADER): This is Gold Leader, standing by.

GARVEN DREIS (RED LEADER): This is Red Leader, standing by.

An Imperial shield crew member alerts his commander of the rebel fleet.

IMPERIAL CREW MEMBER: Sir, those are rebel ships.

IMPERIAL LIEUTENANT: Get Admiral Gorin, immediately!

Down on Scarif, Krennic has been alerted too.

LIEUTENANT MYTUS ADEMA: Director, the rebel fleet, it’s amassing outside the shield.

DIRECTOR ORSON KRENNIC: Lock down the base. Lock down.

LIEUTENANT MYTUS ADEMA: And close the shield?

LIEUTENANT ORSON KRENNIC: Do it!

In the air, the rebels are getting into formations to attack the shield and get past the blockade.

ADMIRAL RADDUS: Red and Gold squadron, attack formations. Defend the fleet. Blue squadron, get to the surface before they closed that gate.

GENERAL ANTOC MERRICK: Copy, your Admiral. Blue squadron, on me.

BARION RANER (BLUE FOUR): Copy, Blue Leader.

FARNS MONSBEE (BLUE FIVE): Copy, Blue Leader.

HEFF TOBBER (BLUE EIGHT): We won’t have long.

Aboard the shield gate, officers are hurrying to lock down the base. An officer pushes a button and the gate slowly closes.

SHIELD GATE OFFICER: Close the field aperture now. Close it!

Rebel pilots racing towards the shield pull up in panic, but not all of them manage to. A few ships crash onto the surface of the shield and explode.

VANGOS GREK (BLUE SIX): Come on, come on, come on!

BARION RANER (BLUE FOUR): Pull up!

Back on Scarif, K-2SO calls out to Jyn as he intercepts transmissions.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: Rebel fleet has arrived.

JYN ERSO: What?

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: There’s fighting on the beach, they’ve locked down the base, they’ve closed the shield gate.

Jyn runs over to him and Cassian.

JYN ERSO: What does that mean? We’re trapped?

Cassian gives her a grim look, and she nods solemnly.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: We could transmit the plans to the rebel fleet. We’d have to get a signal out to tell them it’s coming. It’s the size of the data files. That’s the problem.They’ll never get through. Someone has to take that shield gate down.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Bodhi. Bodhi, can you hear me? Bodhi, tell me you’re out there. Bodhi!

BODHI ROOK: Hello, I’m here. We’re standing by. They’ve started fighting, the base is on lockdown!

CASSIAN ANDOR: I know, listen to me! The rebel fleet is up there. You’ve got to tell them to blow a hole in the shield gate so we can transmit the plans.

BODHI ROOK: Wait, I can’t. I’m not hooked into the comm tower. We’re not tied in.

CASSIAN ANDOR: It’s the only way we’re getting them out of here. Find a way! Cover our backs.

JYN ERSO: You’ll need this. You wanted one, right?

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: Your behavior, Jyn Erso, is continually unexpected.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Jyn. Come on.

The AT-ACT is preparing to fire at the remaining few rebels.

AT-AT PILOT: Fire on my command.

Baze loads a rocket launcher and fires at the neck of the AT-ACT, but the walker only flinches and lifts its head back up. However, it's instantly shot by an X-Wing coming out of nowhere with a few more following it. The rebels erupt in cheers.

BAZE MALBUS: Look!

Inside the shuttle, Bodhi prepares to make a run for it. Another rebel stops him.

BODHI ROOK: Get ready. We’re going to have to go out there.

REBEL: What’re you doing?

BODHI ROOK: They closed the shield gate, we’re stuck here. But, the rebel fleet is pulling in.We just have to get a signal strong enough to get through to them and let them know we’re trapped down here. For that, we have to connect to the communications tower. Now, I can patch us in over here, the landing pad but you have to get on the radio, get one of the guys out there to find a master switch. Get them to activate the connection between us and that comm tower.

REBEL: Okay.

BODHI ROOK: Then go!

Raddus and his crew sit aboard the Mon Calamari cruiser bridge.

ADMIRAL RADDUS: What’s going on down there, Lieutenant?

LIEUTENANT: Unknown, sir. We can’t raise them. All rebel frequencies are blocked.

ADMIRAL RADDUS: Keep trying. Engage those Star Destroyers and let’s start probing that shield.

LIEUTENANT: Yes, sir.

The Red squadron pilots are busy shooting at the shield gate and dodging shots from cannons built on top of it. An X-Wing is hit and goes down in flames.

GARVEN DREIS (RED LEADER): We’re going in! Stay with me.

Jyn and Cassian are in a small control room in the archive tower, searching for the location of the plans. K-2SO is outside by the control panel.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: Schematics bank, Data tower two.

CASSIAN ANDOR: How do I find that?

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: Searching. I can locate the tape, but you’ll need the handles for extraction.

CASSIAN ANDOR: What are we supposed to do with these? Whoa.

They turn around to see the vault door closing. K-2SO is surrounded by stormtroopers and tries to point them away.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: Well, finally.

STORMTROOPER: Wait, stop!

The trooper notices the officer on the floor.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: The rebels! They went over there.

Cassian speaks into the comlink, revealing himself.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Kay. What’s going on out there?

Before the stormtroopers can shoot, K-2 reacts.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: There’s one. Oh well.

He beats up the troopers easily. Up in the sky, the bombers are preparing to attack. Just as they start the attack run, TIE fighters come in from the shield and swarm the rebel fleet.

JON VANDER (GOLD LEADER): Red Leader, this is Gold Leader, we’re starting our attack run on the shield gate. Keep it tight and watch out for those towers.

GOLD PILOT: More fighters. Form up, at 65.

REBEL LIEUTENANT: Sir, enemy fighters coming in.

The TIEs zoom past the Mon Cala cruiser bridge.

CORPORAL STORDAN TONC: Melshi. Melshi, come in, are you there? Bodhi will send a signal from here. He’s patching us in. But you guys have to open up a line for the tower.

SERGEANT RUESCOTT MELSHI: How? Please advise.

CORPORAL STORDAN TONC: There’s a master switch to the base of the Comm tower.

SERGEANT RUESCOTT MELSHI: Master switch, describe, what are we looking for?

CORPORAL STORDAN TONC: What does it look like? The master switch? Where is it?

Merrick leads his Blue Squadron into attack, covering the rebels on the beach.

GENERAL ANTOC MERRICK: Two wings, reinforce those troops on the beach. All fighters, on me. We have to shield them from air attack.

LAREN JOMA (BLUE ELEVEN): Troop reinforcements. Here we go!

A craft full of reinforcements lands and disembarks on the beach with a war cry, attacking the stormtroopers.

REBEL MARINE: For Jedha!

MARINE: Jedha!

The rebels attempting to take down the shield are having no effect on it and are still pressed by TIE fighters.

RED PILOT: We're having no effect on that shield.

BLUE PILOT: How much more can that thing take?

GARVEN DREIS (RED LEADER): Stick close, Red 5, where are you going?

PEDRIN GUAL (RED FIVE): I’m trying to lose them. This is Red 5, I need help!

Red Five is caught in the scopes of a TIE pilot and goes down in flames. Up in the tower, Jyn and Cassian are going through archive after archive.

JYN ERSO: Hyperspace Tracking, Navigational Systems.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: Two screens down. Structural engineering, open that one!

A stormtrooper walks in and K-2 shoots him without even looking his way. Up in the air, the battle rages on. The more advanced TIE Strikers are now chasing down the rebels.

BLUE PILOT: I got one on my tail!

BLUE TWO: I’m on it.

Bodhi connects the cable to the radio while Jyn keeps rummaging through Engineering files.

JYN ERSO: Project code names: Stellarsphere. Mark Omega. Pax Aurora. War-Mantle. Cluster-Prism. Black-Saber.

She stops dead in her tracks.

CASSIAN ANDOR: What?

JYN ERSO: Stardust. That’s it.

CASSIAN ANDOR: How do you know that?

JYN ERSO: I know because it’s me.

Bodhi is fiddling with wires when he is surprised by a stormtrooper aiming at him.

STORMTROOPER: Hey, you. Identify yourself.

BODHI ROOK: I can explain.

STORMTROOPER: Incoming fire, take cover!

The trooper yells at his colleague but is shot down instantly by the rebels.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Kay, we need the file for Stardust!

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: Stardust.

JYN ERSO: That’s it.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Kay.

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: Climb. Climb. You can still send the plans to the fleet. If they open the shield gate, you can broadcast from the tower! Locking the vault door now.

His voice gets high-pitched and he starts closing the door hurriedly as a squad of stormtroopers bursts into the room shooting at him. With his last effort he punches the vault door shut.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Kay. Kay!

K-2SO [KAY-TUESSO]: Good bye.

K-2SO's eyes go dark.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Kay!

Krennic is standing at the window nervously when news arrives.

LIEUTENANT MYTUS ADEMA: Sir, unauthorized access at the data vault.

DIRECTOR ORSON KRENNIC: What? 

LIEUTENANT MYTUS ADEMA: It’s just come in, sir.

DIRECTOR ORSON KRENNIC: Send my guard squadron into battle! Two men with me now! Get that beach under control!

Cassian calls out to Bodhi via comlink.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Bodhi? Are you there? Have you got the switch?

BODHI ROOK: I can’t get to the shuttle, I can’t plug in!

CASSIAN ANDOR: You have to! They have to hit that gate. If the shield’s open, we can send the plans!

Merrick is hit by a TIE Striker shot and goes down just as a Blue pilot warns him.

BLUE: General, behind you!

JYN ERSO: Step back.

Jyn shoots a hole through the glass in the control room, opening up an alternative exit. A TIE fighter hits the wing of Blue Eleven and the pilot screams.

BLUE ELEVEN: We’re going down!

The beach battle rages on. No side seems to be winning so far, but a squad of death troopers arrives. Inside the tower, Jyn takes off her uniform jacket and climbs out the window. They jump over from the wall to the archives at a dazzling height.

REBEL: Come on!

BODHI ROOK: Melshi. Melshi, come in please.

SERGEANT RUESCOTT MELSHI: I’m tied in at my end, I just need an open line. Hang on. The master switch, it’s over at that console.

REBEL: I'm going!

He peeks out, but is instantly shot by a sniper death trooper. Jyn, in turn, almost drops the data disc, but grabs it in the last moment and straps it onto her belt. Krennic is seen walking rapidly towards an elevator.

JYN ERSO: I’ve got it.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Careful! You okay?

The master switch remains untouched. Chirrut emerges from his cover and walks across the battlefield, immune to all shots, as he mumbles his words like a mantra.

CHIRRUT ÎMWE: I’m one with the Force and the Force is with me. I’m one with the Force and the Force is with me.

BAZE MALBUS: Chirrut!

CHIRRUT ÎMWE: I’m one with the Force and the Force is with me. I’m one with the Force and the Force is with me. I’m one with the Force and the Force is with me. I’m one with the Force and the Force is with me. I’m one with the Force and the Force is with me. I’m one with the Force and the Force is with me.

BAZE MALBUS: Chirrut, come back!

Chirrut ignores it and pulls the master switch blindly.

BODHI ROOK: Yes!

CASSIAN ANDOR: Keep going. Keep going!

Jyn keeps climbing up to the exit hatch. Krennic emerges from an elevator door and, after a brief exchange, shoots Cassian and he falls off the tower onto one of the bars below.

JYN ERSO: Cassian.

BAZE MALBUS: Chirrut, come! Come with me!

Chirrut is hit by an explosion, and Baze runs to him in slow motion.

BAZE MALBUS: Chirrut! Chirrut, don’t go. Don’t go.

BAZE MALBUS: I’m here. I’m here. It’s okay. It’s okay.

CHIRRUT ÎMWE: Look for the Force…

BAZE MALBUS: Chirrut.

CHIRRUT ÎMWE: …and you will always find me. The Force is with me. I’m one with the Force. The Force is with me. I’m one with the Force. The Force is with me.

BAZE MALBUS: and I’m one with the Force.

The rebel cruiser is taking heavy damage.

LIEUTENTANT: Deflector shield’s down to 50%, we’re sustaining heavy damage.

ADMIRAL RADDUS: There’s no turning back now, we have to press the attack.

GOLD LEADER: Hit that opening.

GOLD NINE: We see it, Gold Leader. Ion torpedoes away.

The Gold squadron launches torpedoes at the ISD and power goes out on the massive vessel.

STAR DESTROYER CAPTAIN: What’s happening?

IMPERIAL CREW MEMBER: We’ve lost engine power, sir.

ADMIRAL RADDUS: That Star Destroyer is disabled.

BODHI ROOK: This is Rogue One, calling any Alliance ships that can hear me! Is there anybody up there? This is Rogue One! Come in, over.

ADMIRAL RADDUS: This is Admiral Raddus, Rogue One, we hear you!

BODHI ROOK: We have the plans! They found the Death Star plans. They have to transmit them from the communications tower! You have to take down the shield gate. It’s the only way to going to get them through!

ADMIRAL RADDUS: Call up a Hammerhead corvette. I have an idea. Standby, Rogue One, we’re on it.

BODHI ROOK: This is for you, Galen.

BAZE MALBUS: The Force is with me. I’m one with the Force.

A Hammerhead corvette is seen speeding towards the disabled ISD at full power. The crew braces for impact.

HAMMERHEAD CAPTAIN: Corvette 5, locked on target. Prepare for impact.

HAMMERHEAD CAPTAIN: Sublight thrusters, full power!

The corvette crashes into the side of the disabled ISD, bringing it towards the second Destroyer. A horrible collision forces the Destroyers to fall slowly towards the shield gate, breaking it in half. Imperial crew members scream in pain as the ships go down, exploding. Jyn climbs out of the hatch, avoiding its sharp edges, and races to the antenna to send off the plans, but encounters a problem.

COMPUTER: Reset antenna alignment. Reset antenna alignment. Reset antenna alignment. Reset antenna alignment.

Jyn looks over to the side of the tower where there is another control panel, but a TIE Striker almost shoots her off the edge. She barely makes it up and fixes the antenna.

ADMIRAL GORIN: Reverse engines, full power!

COMPUTER: Antenna alignment. Ready to transmit.

Jyn turns away to hear the click of a blaster and Krennic aiming said blaster at her.

DIRECTOR ORSON KRENNIC: Who are you?

JYN ERSO: You know who I am. I’m Jyn Erso. Daughter of Galen and Lyra. You’ve lost.

DIRECTOR ORSON KRENNIC: Oh, I have, have I?

JYN ERSO: My father’s revenge. He built a flaw in the Death Star. He put a fuse in the middle of your machine and I’ve just told the entire galaxy how to light it.

DIRECTOR ORSON KRENNIC: The shield is up, your signal will never reach the rebel base. All the ships in here will be destroyed. I lose nothing but time. YOU, on the other hand die with the Rebellion.

He never finishes, as Cassian shoots him in the shoulder and Jyn sends off the plans in a hurry.

COMPUTER: Transmitting. Transmitting.

REBEL LIEUTENANT: Admiral, receiving transmission from Scarif.

Jyn rushed to the unconscious Krennic to kill him, but Cassian drags her away.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Hey, leave it. Leave it. That’s it. That’s it. Let’s go.

COMPUTER: Transmission received.

LIEUTENANT: Admiral, we have the plans!

ADMIRAL RADDUS: She did it.

In the elevator back to the landing pad, Cassian and Jyn smile at each other weakly.

CASSIAN ANDOR: Do you think anybody is listening?

JYN ERSO: I do. Someone’s out there.

The Mon Cala cruiser has received the transmissions, but someone catches a massive object on the horizon. It's the Death Star. Krennic opens his eyes, and a look of horror flashes on his face as he sees it too.

LIEUTENANT: Sir, we’re detecting a massive object emerging from hyperspace.

Aboard the Death Sta stand Tarkin and Romodi, ready to give the command to fire.

GENERAL HURST ROMODI: Sir, shall I begin targeting their fleet?

GRAND MOFF WILHUFF TARKIN: Lord Vader will handle the fleet. Target the base at Scarif. Single reactor ignition.

GENERAL HURST ROMODI: Yes, sir.

GRAND MOFF WILHUFF TARKIN: You may fire when ready.

GENERAL HURST ROMODI: Commence primary ignition.

The Death Star control panels are ignited and the same green ray emerges from the reactor. Krennic watches silently as it fires, destroying the antenna and hitting the ocean, where a giant wave rises from the impact. Raddus watches the destruction from above.

ADMIRAL RADDUS: Rogue One, may the Force be with you. All ships, prepare for jump to hyperspace!

Just before the fleet can make the jump, The Devastator jumps out of hyperspace, and Darth Vader stands on the bridge as his ISD destroys the remnants of the rebel fleet. On the beach, Jyn and Cassian hug as they fall ont othe sand and watch the wave come toward them.

JYN ERSO: I’m glad you came.

CASSIAN ANDOR: You father would have been proud of you, Jyn.

The music intensifies and the two watch the wave with tears in their eyes as it engulfs them. Everything goes silent. On board the Devastator, Vader is preparing to board the cruiser.

CAPTAIN SHAEF CORSSIN: The rebel flag ship is disabled, my lord, but has received transmission from the surface.

DARTH VADER: Prepare a boarding party.

CAPTAIN SHAEF CORSSIN: Yes, my lord.

On the cruiser, the rebels barely get the plans onto a hard drive and race to the escape pods, but some of them are cut off by a locked door.

REBEL: Hurry!

REBEL 2: Let’s go!

REBEL 1: We got to go now!

REBEL: Hurry, let’s go!

REBEL: It’s stuck.

REBEL: Hey, help!

The music stops, and only the sirens blare in the darkness. Then someone starts breathing, and a crimson lightsaber ignites, revealing Darth Vader himself.

REBEL: Open fire!

REBEL: Help us!

REBEL: It’s jammed!

Vader slaughters the rebels easily and cold bloodedly, despite all their efforts. Someone manages to pass on the plans to the outside before being impaled by his saber. The survivors run to the Tantive IV that's docked to the cruiser.

REBEL: Pull it!

REBEL: Here. Here. Take it! Take it.

REBEL: LAUNCH!

The smaller ship launches the second Vader makes his way to it. He stands on the side of the cruiser, watching the Tantive leave. On board the smaller ship, captain Antilles finds Princess Leia of Alderaan.

CAPTAIN RAYMUS ANTILLES: Make sure you secure the airlock. And prepare the escape pods.

CAPTAIN RAYMUS ANTILLES: Your Highness. The transmission we received. What is it they’ve sent us?

Leia smiles.

PRINCESS LEIA ORGANA: Hope.

THE END

Clone Wars : Animated Series

Ep 1 - Ambush 
Narrator: Great leaders inspire greatness in others. A galaxy, divided by war. Peaceful worlds must choose sides or face the threat of invasion. Republican Seperatist armies vie for the allegiance of neutral planets Desparate to build a Republic supply base in the system of Toydaria, Jedi Master Yoda travels to secret negotiations on a remote neutral moon.
Alien: We are getting no signal from the republic your heighness.
King Katuunko: I don't see anything. It is not like the Jedi to be late.
Asajj Ventress: Greetings, King Katuunko.
King Katuunko: Who are you?
Asajj Ventress: I am only a messenger majesty. My master wishes to speak with you.
Count Dooku (Hologram): Katuunko, Great king of Toydaria, forgive my intrusion.
King Katuunko: Count Dooku.
Count Dooku (Hologram): I am aware Master Yoda hopes you will allow the Jedi to build a Republic base in your system. in exchange for protection, correct?
King Katuunko: Your spies serve you well, Count.
Count Dooku (Hologram): I ask, How can the Jedi protect you, if they cannot protect themselves?
Republican Envoy: Toydarian Royal Delegation, this is the Republican envoy, please respond. General, the Toydarians beacon is active on the moon, but all our transmissions are being jammed.
Battle Droid: We caught them by surprise alright!
Republican Envoy: We're losing our shields.
Yoda: Too late it is, sprung is the trap.
Republican Envoy: I must get you to safety General.
Yoda: Retreat you must, on the moon below, is my mission. There, I must go.
King Katuunko: I suppose you and your droid armies can do better?
Count Dooku (Hologram): Without a doubt. I sense you are one who respects strength, your heighness. Our droid armies outnumber the Republic clones 100 to 1.
King Katuunko: Perhaps, But I have heard, That a single Jedi equals 100 battle droids.

Ep 2 - Rising Malevolence

Narrator:The clone starfleet is under seige! Dozens of Republic warships have been destroyed in merciless surprise attacks that leaves no survivors. Rumours spread of a terrible new Separatist weapon. In the face of growing fear, the Jedi Council sends Master Plo Koon to hunt down the menace before it strikes again....
