Ep 1 - Holocron Heist

Narrator: Jedi trapped on Felucia! Clones are surrounded by droid forces. Their only hope is to escape on Republic gunships waiting to land on the embattled surface. Jedi cruisers have managed to blow a hole in the droid defenses and have sent gunships to the rescue.

Warthog, protect the gunships. I will take out the fighters.

They made it through the first wave.

Concentrate all fire on the cruiser on the left.

I can't shake these two droids!

Come around and I'll try to get them off your tail.

General!

Look out!

That was close.

If those fighters got through, then our gunships can't be far behind.

Prepare the troops to evacuate.

- Go! Go! - Come on!

Come on, grunts! We are leaving!

Cut to:

Anakin: Ahsoka should be back from her jungle patrol by now.

Obi: I'll try to contact her again. Ahsoka, where are you? Ahsoka, what is your location?

Ahsoka [over comlink] : About six klicks east, Master. We’ve engaged the enemy, and we’ve got them on the run. 

[rumbling blasts]

Obi: They’re here to extract us. We’re leaving.

Ahsoka [over comlink] : What? Wha… We can’t retreat now, Master. I’ve broken through!

[screen pan to Anakin, waving Troopers onto the hovering Gunship.]

Anakin: Move it, trooper! Come on, double time!

Ahsoka [over comlink] : The droids are retreating. 

Obi-wan: We’re outnumbered. You must evacuate. That is an order!

Ahsoka [over comlink] : Master Skywalker taught me never to let up when the tinnies are on the run. 

Obi-wan: They are running back here to regroup with the main force. You are putting your troops’ lives in danger, young one. You will get on the gunship when we arrive. 

Anakin: Where’s Ahsoka?

Obi-wan [exasperated] : Following your teachings. 

Anakin: Is she winning?

Obi-wan: For now. 

[the republic gunship rises over the hostile terrain, carrying Obi-wan, Anakin, and a battalion of Troopers to Ahsoka’s location. As they fly over head they spot her, lightsaber drawn, deflecting blaster beams and pressing on.]

Obi-wan: She’s not stopping. 

*Anakin knits his brows with disapproval*

Anakin : Land in front of them. 

Ahsoka : What are you doing!?

Anakin: Get in the ship, now.

Ahsoka: Can’t you see they’re retreating?!

Anakin: They’re about to overrun you, Ahsoka.. You just can’t see it. Now, follow orders and get in the ship. 

*Scene change*

Mace Windu: Padawan Ahsoka, do you feel Master Kenobi’s description of the incident is accurate?

Ahsoka: Yes, my Masters. 

Yoda: More to add, do you?

Ahsoka: I know I was wrong. I just got so caught up in my own success. I didn’t look at the battle as a whole. I wasn’t being disobedient. I just...forgot. 

Anakin: Masters, this incident is my responsibility. Because of Ahsoka’s advanced abilities, I forgot how young she is. I gave her more freedom than I should have. 

Mace Windu: That may be, but it doesn’t excuse what happened on Fulcia. I think she needs some time away from the battlefield. 

Yoda: On archive security, reflect on your actions you can, Padawan. 

Ahsoka: Guard duty? For how long?

Mace Windu: Longer now.

Ep 13 - Voyage of Temptation

Ep 14 - Duchess of Mandalore

Narrator: A diplomatic mission! As dissent threatens to tear Apart the peaceful Mandalore system, Duchess Satine struggles To protect her people against the escalating violence. Betrayed by two of her trusted allies, Satine now travels To Coruscant. There, she hopes to convince the senate that a destructive Splinter group, Death Watch, does not represent the entire Mandalorian government.

?: With your Death Watch army in place, now all we need do Is to sit and wait.

?: But for how long? My men are anxious to fight.

Ep 16 - Cat and Mouse
Narrator: An impenetrable defense. Separatist ships blockade the resource-rich planet of Christophsis, trapping Senator Bail Organa and his relief effort. Desperate to aid the esteemed senator a republic task force under the command of Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker must break the impasse. But time runs short for the senator and the good citizens of Christophsis.

Bail Organa: Separatist forces have overrun our position and we are out of food, water, and munitions. Our situation is desperate.

Anakin Skywalker: Senator Organa? Senator Organa.

Republic Officer: General. Another cruiser's been hit.

Anakin Skywalker: Master Kenobi better get here soon or this is gonna be one short rescue mission.

Wulf Yularen: The Command ship is bearing down on us. Full forward shields! Incoming Fire!

Anakin Skywalker: This isn't gonna be easy.

Trench: Fire all forward cannons. Cut off those Republic supply ships. Separate them from their escort cruisers. I smell fear... and it smells good.

Republic Officer: General, one of the supply ships has been hit.

Anakin Skywalker: Over-fire all reactors. We're gonna blow right past this guy, whoever he is.

Republic Officer: General, a Republic cruiser is coming out of hyperspace behind us.

Anakin Skywlaker: Obi-Wan

Cody: Looks like General Skywalker's already engaged the enemy.

Obi-Wan Kenobi: That's nothing out of the ordinary especially since I gave him direct orders not to.

T1-99: The Republic ship is not breaking off its attack.

Trench: Hold the line. Intensify forward deflectors.

Obi-Wan Kenobi: Anakin, I want you to withdraw.

Anakin Skywalker: Withdraw?

Obi-Wan Kenobi: I brought a new toy that might give us an advantage.

Wulf Yularen: With respect, General, now might not be a bad time to regroup.

Anakin Skywalker: Tell the transports to fall back to Obi-Wan's position. We'll cover their retreat as they escape behind the moon. I don't like this. I hope Obi-Wan knows what he's doing.

T1-99: They are escaping. Should we go after them?

Trench: No. Our orders are to blockade, not chase. I have won this round. Re-cycle the shields and let the cannons reset to a full charge.

Battle Droid: Roger Roger.


Ep 15 - Overlords

"Balance is found in the one who faces his guilt."


-Mysterious message! A transmission has been intercepted far beyond the outer rim, deep in the Crelythiumn system. Why the call has been made and from where cannot be established. But buried in the message is a jedi distress code that has not been used in over 2,000 years. Obi-Wan Kenobi, Anakin Skywalker, and his Padawan Ahsoka are sent to investigate. Fearing a separatist trap, they are to meet with a heavily armed jedi cruiser.-


[whirring]

Anakin: Rex Rex, do you read me? We're at the rendezvous point awaiting your arrival.

Rex: Where are you? Sir, we are at the rendezvous point and there's no sign of you on our scanners.

Anakin: Oh, come on. That's impossible. Something's wrong. We're at the exact coordinates where the distress signal originated, but there's nothing here.

Rex is at the exact same coordinates and he's not here.

Obi-Wan: This is getting interesting.

[breaking up]

Rex: ..Unable to find you. Where are you, sir?

Ahsoka: Something's blocking the signal.

[shuttles electronics powering down]

Obi-Wan: Not good.

Ahsoka: Everything's dead, even the life support.

Anakin: Hmm, this is really strange.

[shuttles electronics powering back up]

Obi-Wan: There. See? Nothing to be concerned about after all.

Ahsoka: Then what's that? It's pulling us towards it.

Obi-Wan: Everyone, strap yourselves in. Looks as though we're going for a ride.

--

Anakin: I must have blacked out.

Obi-Wan: Then who landed the shuttle?

Ahsoka: Not me. Anakin: Mm Where are we?

Ahsoka: Some kind of organic mass. All of our readings indicate that it's bigger than an asteroid. But at least the atmosphere is breathable.

Obi-Wan: Well, this is getting more unusual by the minute. I can't even lock down where in the galaxy we are Or if we are even in our own galaxy.

Anakin: Well, the ship's systems seem ne but for whatever reason, nothing's working.

Ahsoka: Hey! I saw something. A reflection, up on the hill.

Obi-Wan: I don't see anything.

(Woman) Are you the one?

Anakin: What the What? Did you hear that?

Obi-Wan: I didn't hear anything.

(Woman) Are you the one?

Obi-Wan: Hello.

Anakin: Who are you?

Daughter: I am daughter. Are you the one?

Anakin: Uh The one what?

Daughter: I will take you to him.

Ahsoka: Him, who?

Obi-Wan: Did you bring us here?

Daughter: Only he can help you. There is little time. Follow me. We must have shelter by nightfall.

Anakin: And we thought the planet was strange. How about this one?

Obi-Wan: We'll be fine as long as we stay together.

..

Obi-Wan: Have you noticed the seasons seem to change with the time of day?

Anakin: Yeah. Ahsoka: And there are no animals.

Obi-Wan: And you sense it?

Anakin: Mm-hmm, since we arrived. The force is very strong.

Obi-Wan: An intersection unlike anything I've ever felt before. Be wary.

Anakin: Excuse me. Who are you taking us to?

Daughter: The father, of course.

Ahsoka: Of course.

Oi-Wan: And what exactly are you?

Daughter: We are the ones who guard the power. We are the middle, the beginning, and the end.

Anakin: Glad she cleared that up for us.

[low rumbling]

Anakin: Hey! Look out!

Obi-Wan: Thank you.

Ahsoka: You're welcome.

Daughter: It is forbidden for you to touch me.

Anakin: Sorry. I was just saving your life.

Daughter: That was my brother's work. You are in great danger. Wait for me. Do not leave this place.

Anakin: Hey! Wait.

Obi-Wan: Anakin, are you there? Are you all right?

Anakin: Yeah. But our friend here has run off! Go back to the ship and try sending another distress call. I'll follow her and find out how to get off this rock.

Obi-Wan: And if this is a trap?

Anakin: Then I'm not gonna wait around to find out.

Obi-Wan: Anakin, stop! Wait for us to find another way around and meet you. Anakin? So reckless and impatient.

Ahsoka: He'll find her.

Obi-Wan: Yes, and what else?

[distant thunder rumbling]

Ahsoka: Storm's coming.

...

Ahsoka: The ship's gone.

Obi-Wan: Yes, I see that.

Ahsoka: It was here, no question. And look. Everything's dying.

Brother: Did you lose something? You didn't do as you were asked.

Obi-Wan: And what was that?

Brother: My sister said to wait!

Obi-Wan Did she now? Well, we were unfortunately separated. We'd like our ship back if you don't mind.

Brother: Not... Yet.

Brother: Is it true that he is the chosen one?

Obi-Wan: What do you know of such things?

Brother: What is about to happen shall occur whether you like it or not.

Obi-Wan: You are sith.

Ahsoka: What in the universe was that?

Obi-Wan: I'm not quite sure. Quick. There's a cave over there.

...

Anakin: Whoever I'm looking for is in that monastery.

Qui-Gon: I am here because you are here.

Obi-Wan: No, I don't understand. What is this place?

Obi-Wan: Are we in danger?

Qui-Gon: This planet is both an amplifier and a magnet. Three are here who seek Skywalker. They, like me, believe him to be the chosen one.

Obi-Wan: You were right. The force within him is stronger than any known jedi. I have trained him as well as I could, but he is still willful and balance eludes him.

Qui-Gon: If he is the chosen one, he will discover it here.

Obi-Wan: And if not?

Qui-Gon: Then you must realize with his power, this is a very dangerous place for him to be.

....

(woman) Wake up, my son. I must tell you a secret.

Anakin: Who's there? Who's there, I said.

(brother)It is me, ani, your mother.

Anakin: What kind of black arts is this? You're dead.

(brother)Nothing ever really dies, my son. I have a secret to tell you.

Anakin: Then tell me.

(brother)Everything you have done, everything you have learned has led you here.

Anakin: Whatever you are, my mother is Is dead.

(brother)And you blame yourself. Your jedi training has served you well, ani, but you are more than a jedi. Tell me, where is your pain, so I might take it away.

Anakin: I was too late to save you. I failed as a jedi and I failed you.

(brother)How so?

Anakin: I tasted only vengeance when I slaughtered so many to avenge your death.

(brother)It is time you realized that your guilt does not define you, my son. You define your guilt.

Anakin: The only love I feel in my heart is haunted by what would happen should I let go.

Father: Ah. My son, I suspect. We can take many forms. The shapes we embody are merely a reflection of the life force around us. You carry a great sadness in your heart. My children and I can manipulate the force like no other, therefore, it was necessary to withdraw from the temporal world and live here as anchorites.

Anakin: As a sanctuary?

Father: And a prison. You cannot imagine what pain it is to have such love for your children and realize that they could tear the very fabric of our universe.

Anakin: I don't understand.

Father: It is only here that I can control them. A family in balance. The light and the dark. Day with night. Destruction replaced by creation.

Anakin: Then why reveal yourselves to us?

Father: There are some who would like to exploit our power. The sith are but one. Too much dark or light would be the undoing of life as you understand it. When news reached me that the chosen one had been found, I needed to see for myself.

Anakin: The chosen one is a myth.

Father: Is it? I should very much like to know. Why don't we find out together? Pass one test, and I shall know the truth. Then you and your friends may leave.

Ep 1 - Water War

NARRATOR: "Water wars! Tensions run high on the ocean world of Mon Calamari, where two separate peoples, the aggressive squid-like Quarren, and their peaceful neighbor the Mon Calamari struggle to maintain a fragile coexistence. Adding to this strife, the king of the Mon Calamari has been found mysteriously murdered, leaving his young son prince Lee-char to guide his people alone. But the Quarren race will not except the new ruler as their king. Senator Amidila and her Jedi body-guard have arrived to help resolve the matter, and to avoid plunging the planet into civil war..."

Unnamed Mon Calamari: "The world prospered under our ruler!"

Unnamed Quarren: "It's time for a change!"

Unnamed Mon Calamari: "The prince's rule has been preordained!"

Unnamed Quarren: "Down with this monarchy!"

Unnamed Mon calamari: "We'll defend our right for a Mon Cala king!"

Unnamed Quarren: "We want a Quarren king!"

Unnamed Quarren: "Down with the Mon Cala, power to the Quarren!"

Prince Lee-Char: "I am dedicated to serving the Quarren as well as my own people, the Mon Calamari."

Riff Tamson: "Silence! You haven't earned the right to speak."



Ep 7 - Darkness of Umbara
Moral: The first step towards loyalty is trust

Republic forces smash through the Separatist blockage in an effort to claim the shadowy world.

Rex: But sir--

Krell: CT-7567, are you reading me?

Rex: Excuse me, Sir?

Krell: I asked you a question, CT-7567. Do you understand the need to adhere to my strategy.

Rex: Sir, the terrain is extremely hostile. Despite the difficulty of the conditions, the battalion is making good time. These men just need a little break.

Krell: Captain, do I need to remind you of this battalion's strategic mission in conquering this planet? Look back. See those platoons? Their mission is to take this city and take it swiftly. Time and rest are luxuries the Republic cannot afford. We are the key to this invasion. The other battalions are counting on our support. If we fail, everyone fails. Do you understand this? Do all of you understand this? Now, move on!

Rex: Sir, we're ready to bring our forward platoons in for a surgical strike on the city's defenses.

Krell: There won't be any need, Captain.

Rex: Sir?

Krell: All platoons will execute a forward assault along the main route to the city.

Rex: But. Sir, General Skywalker's plan was to surprise them with multiple attacks. If we come in from the main route, they're likely to engage us in a full-frontal assault.

Krell: Change of plans, Captain. I'm in command now.

Rex: With all due respect, General, we don't know what we're up against. It might be wiser to think first.

Krell: Are you questioning my order? This battalion will take the main road straight to the capital. You will not stop and you will not turn back, regardless of the resistance you meet. We will attack them with all our troops, not some sneak attack with a few men. That is my order, and you will follow it explicitly. Do I make myself clear, CT-7567?

Rex: Yes, General.

Krell: Now, engage.

Clone Trooper: So, why aren't we sticking to the original plan and probing the city defenses first?

Hardcase: We can do this. Let's take 'em!

Clone Trooper: Yeah, leave it to Hardcase to dive in head-first.

Fives: The general's new plan is reckless.

Dogma: You ever think that maybe the general knows what he is doing?

Fives: I know you think this is a bad idea.

Rex: I raised my objection to General Krell's plan, but he didn't agree. So this is it.

Fives: Well what if he's wrong? Then what?

Rex: This isn't the time for a debate. Right now we have to stay alert.

Clone Trooper: Eh, it's too quiet out there.

Clone Trooper: Ah! Ah!

Rex: Mines! Nobody move!

Clone Trooper: Oz is down.

Clone Trooper: So is Ringo.

Rex: Can you sweep 'em?

Fives: There are more over here. Looks like the whole road's been booby trapped. Everyone watch your step.

Clone Trooper: We're completely exposed!

Rex: Hold your ground!

Hardcase: You want a piece of this?

Clone Trooper: I think Hardcase made 'em mad.

Clone Trooper: We're blown!

Rex: The Umbarans are advancing!

Hardcase: Make 'em eat heat!

Umbaran: Ah!

Clone Troopers: Ah! Yah! Yah! Ah!

Dogma: They're coming from all directions.

Rex: We don't have any cover! We need to pull back. Get them to follow us. If we can draw them out, we can see them. If we can see them, we can hit them. All squads, pull back now!

Clone Trooper: This can't be good.

Krell: Feeble-minded clones. Get in there and save their necks.

Rex: Get ready! Here they come!

Rex: Stand fast. Hit 'em with everything you've got.

Hardcase: Ha, ha, ha! Where you goin'? Get back here!

Rex: They're falling back!

Krell: CT-7567, do you have a malfunction in your design? You pulled your forces back from taking the capital city. The enemy now has control of this route. This entire operation has been compromised because of your failure!

Fives: General Krell, in case you haven't noticed, Captain Rex just saved this platoon. Surely you won't fail to recognize that.

Krell: ARC-5555, stand down.

Fives: Sir, yes, Sir.

Rex: Sir, if I may address your accusation; I followed your orders, even in the face of a plan that was in my opinion severely flawed, a plan that cost us men, not clones! Men! As sure as it is my duty to remain loyal to your command, I also have another duty, to protect those men.

Krell: You have a spark of tenacity, Captain. I'll give you that. I know that I don't command like the Jedi you're used to serving. Certainly not like General Skywalker. But I have my way. It may be difficult, but these are difficult times. And it's proven effective. I suppose your loyalty to your men is to be commended. They seem to admire this. That's important to an effective commander. All right, Captain Rex, your opinion has been noted. Dismissed.

Fives: I think he almost complimented you.

Rex: Uh, it's hard to tell.

Clone Trooper: Incoming!

Rex: The Umbarans must've regrouped for a counterattack. Everyone, we must hold this position!

Fives: You think General Krell still intends on taking the capital using this strategy?

Rex: I don't know. I'll get back to you on that if we survive this battle.



Ep 8 - The General

Moral: The path of ignorance is guided by fear.

Announcer: Turning the tide. As separatist control over vital but isolated supply routes expands, Republic forces invade a key planet-- the darkened world of Umbara. In the midst of helping Obi-Wan Kenobi's battalion conquer the Umbaran capital, Anakin Skywalker is called away to Coruscant. His battalion is temporarily placed under the command of Jedi General Pong Krell-- a shrewd and temperamental leader. Krell's reckless strategy forced Captain Rex to retreat with his platoons in a disastrous defeat.

Captain Rex: We have got to move before those fighters come back.

Fives: Rex! Rex, over here!

Captain Rex: Jesse, take the right flank. Dogma, take the left flank.

Clone Trooper: You're going to be okay, buddy. This will ease the pain.

Fives: Ugh!

Obi-Wan: The capital city's too fortified. We need your battalion to help us take it.

Krell: Resistance from the Umbarans has been greater than anticipated. We're holding our ground at the moment.

Obi-Wan: We've gathered intel on an airbase to the West. It is resupplying the capital's defenses.

Clone Trooper: Incoming! Incoming! Get down! Get down!

Obi-Wan: If you could capture that airbase, it will sever the capital's supply lines, allowing the rest of our forces to move in.

Krell: I'll see to it that the airbase is placed under our control.

Obi-Wan: Remember, General Krell, the entire invasion depends on your battalion.

Krell: Captain Rex, have those coordinates mapped and all troops ready to move out immediately.

Captain Rex: Yes, General.

Captain Rex: There's a base there, all right. And it's heavily guarded. At least three tank divisions, plus guns.

Krell: We'll advance along the central gorge and engage their forces in a full-forward assault.

Captain Rex: The gorge is narrow, Sir. We'll only be able to move our platoons in single squads. Perhaps a closer recon will tell us if there's a more secure route.

Krell: Obi-Wan and the other battalions are holding off the enemy right now while they wait for us to take out this base. We don't have time to look for a more secure route.

Captain Rex: Yes, Sir.

Captain Rex: All right, listen up. We'll assemble the squads into two divisions. We'll move straight up this gorge towards the airbase at the far side.

Clone Trooper: The casualties are going to be be high.

Clone Trooper: Is Krell trying to get us killed?

Clone Trooper: You know, I wasn't sure that Krell was crazy before, but now I'm positive.

Fives: We had to retreat from the capital because the general pushed a flawed strategy. Now this?

Clone Trooper: I don't know. Could be fun.

Dogma: Well, I for one agree with the general's plan. We're running out of time and this is the best option.

Jesse: No recon? No air support? We don't know what we're up against. They have weapons we've never seen before.

Captain Rex: A few of General Skywalker's plans seemed reckless too, but they worked.

Fives: Yeah but General Skywalker is usually leading his men up in the front, not bringing up the rear like General Krell. A full forward assault would leave us too exposed.

Clone Trooper: We have to look at other options.

Clone Trooper: It's going to be a meat grinder down there.

Captain Rex: Fives... It would help if you'd ease their minds.

Fives: Oh, you mean coax them into following another one of Krell's suicide missions? We lost a lot of men last time.

Captain Rex: Krell may do things differently, but he is effective at getting them done. He's a recognized war hero.

Fives: He may have had some victories, but have you seen his casualty numbers? More troopers have been killed under his command than anyone else.

Captain Rex; That's the price of war, Fives. We're soldiers. We have a duty to follow orders, and, if we must, lay down our lives for victory.

Fives: Do you believe that? Or is that what you were engineered to think?

Captain Rex: I honor my code. That's what I believe.

Captain Rex: Is everyone clear on the plan? Hardcase?

Hardcase: Yes, Sir.

Captain Rex: Fives? Are you clear?

Fives: Yeah.

Captain Rex: All right, get in your groups. Let's move out.

Fives: Everybody stay alert. Fingers on the trigger.

Clone Trooper: They look spooked. What the...

Clone Trooper: Oh, skrag.

Captain Rex: Blast it!

Clone Trooper: Look out!

Fives: Its head is ray shielded. We need rocket launchers!

Fives: Mayday! Mayday! Rex, we need rocket launchers-- now!

Captain Rex: Get those rocket launchers down there. Move it, troopers!

Clone Trooper: Take it. Take it.

Clone Trooper: Thanks, buddy.

Clone Trooper: I got him.

Captain Rex: Go! Go, go, go! Keep moving! Keep moving!

Captain Rex: That was close.

Hardcase: You got a point there.

Captain Rex: Move it, trooper.

Captain Rex: Everyone regroup, now! Take cover!

Clone Trooper: Move it! Move it!

Fives: We're safe for the moment.

Captain Rex: They'll be coming around any second. Bring up the launchers. Spread detonators along that corridor. Trap them into the bottleneck. We're going to blow those things sky high. Hurry up. We only have a few seconds.

Clone Trooper: Here they come.

Clone Troopers: Hey! Come on! Over here! Right over here! Over here! Whoo!

Captain Rex: Ugh.

Clone Trooper: We got 'em! We got 'em!

Captain Rex: Good job. All right, let;s move out.

Captain Rex: That one's still got some juice in it. Waste it!

Hardcase: Sure.

Clone Trooper: No juice left in him either.

Clone Trooper: Hey! Still hungry? Chew on that!

Captain Rex: Everyone, keep moving. Hey, Kix, leave it.

Captain Rex: We've got a problem. Fall back! Fall back now!

Krell: What are they doing? Captain, continue your attack.

Captain Rex: Sir, we're overpowered. We need reinforcements.

Krell: The rest of the battalion is holding the entrance to the gorge, Captain. They're guarding it so your troops can break through to the airbase.

Captain Rex: Sir, we can't possibly...

Krell: You must stand your ground. Do you read me? Captain? Are you listening? Do not fall back. That is an order!

Sergeant Appo: The platoons are in the formation you requested, General. Should I send them yo support Captain Rex?

Krell: I'll give the order when I give it, Sergeant Appo.

Captain Rex: Keep the wounded as quiet as possible. All right, you heard the General. Let's go.

Clone Trooper: You can't be serious.

Fives: I used to think that General Krell was reckless, but now I'm beginning to think he just hates clones.

Dogma: The Captain is right. Now, let's move out.

Fives: We can't take them head on. We need to find another way.

Captain Rex: You got any ideas? Then this is it.

Hardcase: Okay. Let's do it.

Clone Trooper: Ah!

Captain Rex: Watch your left!

Clone Trooper: Ah!

Clone Trooper: Rocket launchers don't work on these things!

Clone Trooper: Oh!

Clone Troopers: Ah!

Kix: Help me with the wounded! We got to get these guys out of here.

Captain Rex: Forget it. We have to leave them.

Kix: We can't just leave them, Sir.

Captain Rex: You don't have a choice. That's an order.

Kix: You sound like General Krell.

Captain Rex: Look, Kix, it's more important to save yourself right now. If we survive, you can patch up the wounded later.

Clone Trooper: We're... we're finished.

Captain Rex: We've still got some fight left in us, Tup, and I've got an idea.

FIves: What were you thinking?

Captain Rex: Remember what you were saying about finding another way to destroy those tanks?

Fives: Yeah.

Captain Rex: Well, I have a mission for you.

Krell: CT-7567, where are you?

Captain Rex: General Krell, we've come up with a plan to infiltrate the airbase.

Krell: What is your plan?

Captain Rex: I've dispatched two men on a stealth incursion into the airbase. They've been ordered to co-opt starfighters and use them against the tanks.

Krell: You what? You put this entire assault on your hope that two clones could do what your entire group could not?

Captain Rex: Sir, the rocket launchers don't work on these tanks, and it'll be easier to slip by undetected while the rest of us keep the tanks occupied.

Krell: Captain, you will launch a full-forward strike immediately! Or you will be relieved of duty.

Captain Rex: We need to hold out as long as we can. I'm trusting Fives and Hardcase to pull this thing off.

Hardcase: The second they spot us, I start blastin'.

Fives: Hardcase, can't you take it easy for once? Stick to the plan instead of guns blazing.

Hardcase: I'm sorry, it's just how I am. My commander on Kamino said my growth acceleration chamber had a leak. Made me hyperactive, I guess.

Fives: Shh! There's the airbase. Hmm. Some kind of sensor wall. Use the tree to get over the sensor wall.

Hardcase: Uh, how am I supposed to do this, exactly?

Fives: Figure it out.

Hardcase: "Figure it out, Hardcase. Figure it out." What's to figure out about climbing up a tree? How about you try it next time? Great. Nice view. I prefer a good fight to all this sneaking around.

Fives: Wow, I never actually thought that would work.

Fives: So how do I start this thing?

Hardcase: Well, how should I know? Start pushing buttons. Whoa-ho-ho-ho-ha ha! Glad these things are ray shielded.

Fives: Whoa! Whoa-ho-ho. Whoa! Oh!

Hardcase: I don't think I can do this.

Fives: Ha! Watch out!

Hardcase: Whoa, whoa, whoa.

Hardcase: Let's hope this trip was worth it.

Fives: All right, let's go!

Clone Trooper: Ah!

Clone Trooper: Hey, Kix, bring it down. You're wasting heat.

Captain Rex: What the...

Fives: Clear out, Captain.

Hardcase: The big guns have arrived, Sir!

Fives: Yeah!

Hardcase: Take that! Whoo-hoo!

Fives: Yeah, whoo! That's the stuff!

Clone Troopers: Way to go boys! Yeah! Atta boy, Hardcase! Whoo!

Fives: All right, let's bring 'em home.

Krell: Impressive. Sergeant, their defenses are down. Send in the rest of our forces. Attack the airbase!

Sergeant Appo: All units move out.

Captain Rex: Despite Hardcase's flying, you two saved us all.

Hardcase: That wasn't so tough.

Fives: You sure? You looked a little green when you came out of that fighter.

Krell: Captain, report. What is our situation?

Captain Rex: General, we have taken the base and cut off enemy supply lines to the capital.

Krell: Luck has smiled on you today, Captain. Consider yourself fortunate.

Captain Rex: It wasn't all luck, Sir. A lot of men died to take this base.

Krell: The price for such victory. Perhaps someday you'll realize this. Dismissed.

Fives: He's the one who will never realize.




Ep 15 - Deception

Narrator: A terrorist threat! Moralo Eval, mastermind of a Separatist plot to kidnap Chancellor Palpatine, has been captured by Republic forces! But even with the criminal behind bars, rumors swirl in the underworld of Coruscant that Moralo's plot has already been set in motion With precious time running out, the Jedi Council hatches their own plot to keep the Chancellor safe.

OBI-WAN KENOBI, ANAKIN SKYWALKER, and AHSOKA TANO walk out of a building towards a speeder. As they walk, they talk.

Anakin: So what's the big rush?

Obi-Wan: The Jedi Council has called an emergency meeting.

Anakin: I can see it now. Another long, boring debate.

On top of one of the buildings, a SNIPER takes AIM. The TRIO is oblivious.

Ahsoka: Would you rather they call you in to train younglings?

Anakin: Are you crazy?

The SNIPER slowly adjusts his AIM for OBI-WAN. Then he FIRES, multiple times. THEY dodge and hide behind CRATES.

Obi-Wan: Any idea where that shot came from?

AHSOKA spies the SNIPER.

Ahsoka: A sniper. I see him up there!

OBI-WAN outlines his plan, getting nods from ANAKIN and AHSOKA TANO for acceptance of their JOBS.

Obi-Wan: All right, here's the plan. Anakin, you flank him on the right. Ahsoka, you cover the lower streets. I'm going after him.

All THREE take out their LIGHTSABERS and get ready for combat. All THREE run forward. The SNIPER tries to AIM but can not, so he TURNS and takes off. The TRIO Force-jump up the buildings to get to the TOP. Once they ARRIVE, they hide. OBI-WAN and ANAKIN are SHOT at by the SNIPER. The SNIPER takes off. All THREE pursue.

OBI-WAN finds the SNIPER. ANAKIN and AHSOKA contact HIM.

Anakin: I lost him! Obi-Wan, do you have anything?

OBI-WAN does not RESPOND, instead, he takes a deep BREATH and walks directly into the line of FIRE. The SNIPER takes the SHOT. OBI-WAN is HIT and falls over the building. He LANDS in front of AHSOKA, and ANAKIN calls out to him.

Anakin: Obi-Wan!

Ahsoka: I got him, go!

ANAKIN pursues the SNIPER. The SNIPER runs and gets on a SPEEDER before ANAKIN can catch up. As he DRIVES off, he drops a SMOKE GRENADE. ANAKIN is stopped. Unable to follow, he TURNS back. 

Cut to:

AHSOKA cradles OBI-WAN's body in her lap. ANAKIN drops down from the building and RUNS to THEM. 

Anakin: How is he?

AHSOKA looks up, tears in her eyes. ANAKIN kneels, calling his name.

Anakin: Obi-Wan. Obi-Wan. Obi-Wan!

Cut to:

Outside view of the JEDI TEMPLE. ZOOMS in to show OBI-WAN KENOBI's FUNERAL. ANAKIN stands at the foot of the CASKET, hood drawn up, scowling. AHSOKA turns to PLO KOON.

Ahsoka: I'm worried about Anakin. He hasn't said a word since it happened.

ANAKIN still scowls as OBI-WAN's CASKET is LOWERED into the ground. The PIT closes and a beam of yellow LIGHT ignites. ANAKIN's eyes widen before he SCOWLS deeper.

Cut to:

A seedy BAR is shown. A MAN walks into the bar. A WOMAN sitting at the bar looks the MAN over as he puts his HELMET down and sits.

Woman: Wow. I want to check his midi-chlorian count.

Bartender: What's your pleasure?

Man: Shot of your finest.

The WOMAN gets up and walks closer.

Woman: So what's the big deal?

The MAN gets his SHOT, and as he explains, THROWS it back.

Man: I'm celebrating. The death of a Jedi. I killed Obi-Wan Kenobi!

Cut to:

Walking a HALLWAY in the JEDI TEMPLE is MACE WINDU and YODA. As THEY WALK towards a door, they TALK.

Mace: Having second thoughts, Master Yoda?

Yoda: Hmm, heading down a dark path, we are.

Mace: We talked about this. Killing a Jedi was the best move we had.

Yoda: Hmm.

MACE and YODA walk into the MED WING, into a room that holds OBI-WAN. OBI-WAN is being tended to by a DROID.

Obi-Wan: So, how was my funeral?

Yoda: A better performance than you, your corpse gave.

Obi-Wan: Whatever do you mean? I fell from the top of a building. I could have killed myself.

Yoda: Survived worse, you have. Young Skywalker knows this.

Obi-Wan: I took the vitals suppressor as instructed. I was dead to the world when Anakin moved my body.

OBI-WAN turns to MACE.

Obi-Wan: There's no way he could know I was alive.

Yoda: Not know, but sense, he will, that something is not right.

Obi-Wan: Keeping Anakin on the outside was critical. Everyone knows how close we are. It was his reaction that sold the sniper. I'm sure of it.

Mace: What's done is done. We need to get your transformation underway.

Obi-Wan: Well, time for a shave! Tell me about my target.

A DROID begins to CUT his HAIR. As MACE begins to talk, he pulls out a HOLO-RECORDER to show MORALO EVAL.

Mace: His name is Moralo Eval. Works directly for Count Dooku. Rumor is their plot will be hatched in three revolutions at the festival on Naboo. We tried to make a deal with Moralo for more details, but he was uncooperative.

MACE turns off the HOLO-RECORDER.

Obi-Wan: Any details that might help me gain his trust while in prison?

Mace: Eval killed his mother when he was only a boy. Told the authorities he did it because he was bored.

Obi-Wan: Hmm, I'll try not to bore him.

As YODA begins to speak, OBI-WAN is REVEALED, shaved. OBI-WAN TOUCHES his face in wonder.

Yoda: Not a game is this, Obi-Wan. The risks, great they are.

Obi-Wan: Yes, and so are the rewards. Besides preventing Eval from abducting the Chancellor, he could lead us to Grievous, and possibly Dooku himself.

Droid: Facial transformation program loaded.

OBI-WAN lays back on the bed, readying himself for the TRANSFORMATION.

Obi-Wan: I take it there's no way to have the Chancellor pull out of the festival?

Yoda: No. See it as a sign of weakness, he would.

Obi-Wan: Sign of weakness. Wouldn't want that.

A large NEEDLE is placed in OBI-WAN's neck. OBI-WAN's face starts to SHIFT and CHANGE. OBI-WAN shows great pain as his face SHIFTS. FIGHTING and SHIFTING as his face CHANGES.

Droid: Transformation initiated.

Cut to:

BACK in the BAR, RAKO HARDEEN is drinking with the WOMAN from before. A DROID rolls up to RAKO HARDEEN.

Woman: This cantina is a bust. Do you want to go to the next one? 

Droid: Rako Hardeen? 

Rako: Who wants to know?

Droid: Your employer has your payment. Please follow me.

As RAKO gets up to FOLLOW the DROID, he CALLS out.

Rako: Round for the house!

Bar Patrons: Yes! Oh, yeah!

The DROID leads RAKO into a HALLWAY and then into a ROOM.

Droid: This way. Inside if you please.

The ROOM is dark and a CLOAKED FIGURE is sitting in a CHAIR.

Cloaked Figure: Well done, Mr. Hardeen. You did precisely the job we hired you for. We have your credits right here. But first we need one more thing.

The CLOAKED FIGURE gets up, showing that he is OBI-WAN KENOBI wearing RAKO HARDEEN's face.

Obi-Wan: Your clothes.

Rako: What the - 

RAKO HARDEEN backs up, SHOCKED, into MACE WINDU. 

Fade to black.

Cut to: 

AHSOKA and ANAKIN are flying towards an UNKNOWN DESTINATION.

Ahsoka: I still don't understand. Did Master Yoda say how they found the sniper?

Anakin: Who cares. All that matters is they did.

Cut to:

Back in the ROOM, MACE interrogates RAKO HARDEEN.

Rako: So I took off in my speeder, and then I got a ride here. That's it.

Mace: Keep talking. Into this.

MACE shows off his RECORDER. RAKO HARDEEN complains as OBI-WAN comes out DRESSED in his CLOTHES.

Rako: This is stupid! Confessing to a murder I didn't even do!

Obi-Wan: Oh, but you did For all intents and purposes, Obi-Wan Kenobi is dead. And that certainly was your intention. How do I look?

Mace: Like a criminal. Should buy you all the credibility you need in prison.

Rako: Look, I don't know what you guys are up to, but

Obi-Wan: Do we have enough recording?

Mace: I believe so. Which means you can go to sleep now.

MACE JEDI-TRICKS RAKO HARDEEN to sleep.

Obi-Wan: So how does this vocal emulator work?

The RECORDER BEEPS and TRANSFORMS into a BALL with LEGS. It CRAWLS up OBI-WAN's arm.

Mace: Well, you swallow it.

Obi-Wan: I was afraid you'd say that. 

OBI-WAN swallows the RECORDER. As it works, OBI-WAN's VOICE changes. Now, OBI-WAN looks and sounds the part of RAKO HARDEEN

Obi-Wan: What an odd sensation. It will take some getting used to.

Mace: That's a luxury you don't have.

Obi-Wan: I hope this works.

Cut to:

ANAKIN and AHSOKA walk into the BAR. As the DOORS shut behind ANAKIN, he activates his LIGHTSABER. All the BAR PATRONS turn to look at them.

Anakin: Where is Rako Hardeen?

Bartender: Ah, Back room.

ANAKIN leads AHSOKA into the backroom. OBI-WAN, playing RAKO HARDEEN, is curled up on the BED.

Ahsoka: Is he dead?

Anakin: He's about to be.

ANAKIN rolls him over. OBI-WAN - RAKO HARDEEN rolls over and SQUINTS.

Obi-Wan: A Jedi? I already killed a Jedi today. Let me sleep.

Anakin: He's not dead. He's drunk. Get up, you filth!

ANAKIN grabs OBI-WAN up by the COLLAR and SNARLS in his face. Unhappy, ANAKIN threatens him, while AHSOKA stands in the corner.

Anakin: If it was up to me I would kill you right here! But lucky for you, the man you murdered would rather see you rot in jail.

OBI-WAN is drunk and does not RESPOND.

Anakin: Now, let's go, you coward, before I change my mind.

ANAKIN and AHSOKA walk OBI-WAN out.

Cut to:

A PRISON, where ANAKIN and AHSOKA have taken OBI-WAN to stay.

Anakin: You should be expecting this scum.

Clone: Yes, sir.

Anakin: Let me know if he's any trouble. I'd be happy to straighten him out.

Cut to:

Inside the PRISON, the INMATES, all watch OBI-WAN enter. It is time for FOOD, and they are all either SEATED or getting FOOD. They all WHISPER as OBI-WAN wearing RAKO HARDEEN's face goes to sit down.

Inmate 1: That's him! Kenobi's killer!

Inmate 2: Rako Hardeen.

Inmate 1: He doesn't look so tough.

Inmate 2: He killed a Jedi.

The INMATES including MORALO EVAL watch OBI-WAN sit down. OBI-WAN takes a bit of FOOD and SPITS it out. A couple INMATES come over to HASSLE OBI-WAN. OBI-WAN ignores them, even as INMATE 3 sips his DRINK and BERATES him.

Inmate 3: That's him? That's the Jedi killer? He doesn't look so tough. You don't look so tough to me.

Obi-Wan: This food tastes terrible.

OBI-WAN stabs INMATE 3 with a FORK and DRAGS him down to his level. INMATE 3 ROARS. The CLONE GUARDS look down at the COMMOTION.

Obi-Wan: Maybe you'd taste better.

Clone Guard: Hey, what's going on down there?

Obi-Wan: Sorry, just playing with my food.

INMATE 3: You're crazy!

The INMATES run from him. As they leave, OBI-WAN pays them no mind. MORALO EVAL comes and SITS with him. As MORALO EVAL talks, OBI-WAN stays silent.

Moralo: Rako Hardeen. Your reputation precedes you. I'm curious, when you killed that Jedi, was it for money or revenge?

Obi-Wan: I don't know. Guess I was bored.

MORALO EVAL finds that FUNNY. Chuckling he picks up the SAUCE and scoots it closer to OBI-WAN.

Moralo: Try the sauce. It makes that slop almost tolerable. I'll be seeing you, Mr. Hardeen.

Cut to:

The CLONE GUARDS move OBI-WAN to his CELL via a LIFT. When OBI-WAN enters the CELL. MORALO EVAL and CAD BANE are there.

Clone Guard: Here you go, Hardeen. Home, sweet home. 

Obi-Wan: What a coincidence.

Moralo: No coincidence. I am Moralo Eval, and I have great influence here.

Obi-Wan: What do you want from me?

Moralo: A man like you - There's bigger game than Jedi, if you've got the guts.

Obi-Wan: I'm listening.

Moralo: It's a brilliant plan if I do say so. And it involves the Chancellor.

CAD BANE interrupts them by ROLLING over and SITTING up.

Cad Bane: If I'm breaking out this goon along with us, it'll cost you. Double my rate.

Moralo: Rako Hardeen, meet Cad Bane.

Obi-Wan: Who you calling a goon?

CADE BANE jumps down from his BED and stalks closer.

Cad Bane: Any imbecile can kill a Jedi with a lousy sniper blast. You want my respect? You do it face-to-face.

Obi-Wan: Who said I want your respect?

Cad Bane: Make that triple my rate.

Moralo: Oh, what a shame. Seems this cell isn't big enough for the three of us. Guard! It's been a pleasure chatting with you, Hardeen. But you will forget everything you heard in here, or Moralo Eval will have you slaughtered.

OBI-WAN is ushered out of the CELL by the CLONE GUARDS.

Cut to:

The PRISON GYM is packed. OBI-WAN heads towards one of the MACHINES and CLEARS his throat at two of the INMATES who were using the EQUIPMENT. Nervously, THEY get up.

Inmate 2: We were just leaving.

OBI-WAN makes a SHOW out of STRETCHING and PREPPING. Subtly, OBI-WAN reaches under the MACHINE and pulls out a TRANSMITTER and EARPIECE. Hundreds of STAR MILES away, MACE WINDU and YODA wait in a ROOM for his report.

Obi-Wan: This is Ben. I found the transmitter, but I shall have to make this short. We have a problem. I made contact with Eval. He nearly divulged his kidnap plot, but Cad Bane stopped him.

Mace: Cad Bane? We had no intel they were in league together.

Obi-Wan: It appears Eval's hired Bane to break him out of prison, and the way they were talking, it's imminent.

Yoda: Foolish we were, to believe Bane's capture was without purpose.

Obi-Wan: Yes. Yes, but we can make this work for us. If they do try to escape, I won't let them out of my sight. No doubt he shall lead us to some answers about the plot and possibly to his superiors.

Mace: Good idea, Obi-Wan. Just don't blow your cover. It could take a while to extract you from prison. 

Obi-Wan: Not to worry. I'm starting to enjoy playing the villain.

A CLONE GUARD starts to walk his way.

Obi-Wan: Gotta go!

Cut to: 

Inside the PRISON MESS HALL OBI-WAN goes to eat his LUNCH. BOBA FETT calls to him, angry.

Boba: Hey, Hardeen! You owe me something. 

Obi-Wan: Oh, do I?

Boba: You don't even remember me? That's very insulting.

Obi-Wan: Look, kid, I don't want any trouble.

Boba: You stole a bounty from me, and I want an apology!

The INMATES start to get involved and start CHEERING and CALLING out.

Inmate 1: Kill him, Hardeen, like the Jedi!

Unknown Inmate: What's wrong, Hardeen? Lose your spine?

Obi-Wan: You don't want to do this.

Unkown Inmate: Kill him!

BOBA FETT looks behind him to see CAD BANE nod before he turns to OBI-WAN to ATTACK.

Boba: Oh, yes, I do.

Obi-Wan: I warned you.

OBI-WAN and BOBA fight. It lasts a SHORT TIME and OBI-WAN subdues BOBA FETT before the CLONES come over to BREAK IT UP.

Clone Guards: All right, all right, that's it! Fight's over!

INMATE 3 stops the CLONE GUARDS.

Inmate 3: No, it ain't! You got a problem with Boba, you got a problem with me! 

INMATE 3 attacks OBI-WAN, throwing him across the TABLE. After that, ALL THE INMATES start RIOTING. 

Clone Guard: All right, that's enough, big fella!

Inmate: - Fight! -

The CLONE GUARDS quickly lose control of the PRISON. The INMATES subdue the CLONE GUARDS and begin a RIOT.

Inmates: Let's get them! Let's get them! Riot! Get the guards! Get 'em! Yeah!

Clone Guard: We need reinforcements in here. Now!

Inmate 1: Kill the guards! Riot! Riot!

OBI-WAN gets up from being TOSSED. MORALO EVAL and CAD BANE sit at the TABLE and discuss, calmly, what is happening.

Moralo: What do we do?

Cad Bane: Part of my plan. Paid off the kid to create a diversion.

The BACKUP CLONE GUARDS arrive and open the door. THEY are quickly overwhelmed by the INMATES. Through the DOORS the INMATES escape. Giving CAD BANE and MORALO the perfect opportunity. As they leave, OBI-WAN follows them.

Cad Bane: Let's go.

Woman over Loud Speaker: Facility on lockdown. Facility on lockdown. Facility on lockdown.

Clone Guard.Turn your weapons off stun! Kill the prisoners if you have to!

OBI-WAN catches up to MORALO and CAD BANE.

Obi-Wan: Hey, wait for me.

Cad Bane: No one invited you.

Moralo: He killed a Jedi. He could be helpful.

Cad Bane: Fine. We're wasting time.

ALL THREE begin their escape.

Cut to:

Two CLONE GUARDS are moving a DEAD BODY into a POD.

Clone Guard 1: Uh, I'm telling you, it's gonna be a long night.

They LEAVE. OBI-WAN, CADE BANE, and MORALO come around the CORNER.

Obi-Wan: This is our way out of here. The morgue? This is your brilliant plan?

Cad Bane: Not the first time I've broken out of this stink hole.

The TRIO hurries forward to open the DOORS into the MORGUE. CAD BANE inputs the CODE, but it is DENIED.

Cad Bane: The lock has changed.

Moralo: Your plan has failed.

Cad Bane: Shut up! Let me think.

OBI-WAN darts forward to take off the COVER of the HUB.

Obi-Wan: I can get us inside. I'll re-wire the access port on this door. It'll take some time, so warn me if anyone comes.

Cad Bane: Make it quick.

Making sure NO ONE is watching, OBI-WAN uses the FORCE to engage the lock to UNLOCK. CAD BANE and MORALO hurry back and they all ENTER the MORGUE together.

Obi-Wan: We're in!

Cad Bane: All the riot casualties are sent to the crematorium. From there it's an easy escape.

Clone Guard 1: Another night, another riot.

They hear the GUARDS returning and quickly HIDE in the PODS.

Obi-Wan: The guards are coming back.

Clone Guard 1: You said it, partner. I'll take blasting clankers any day over this.

Clone Guard 2: Yeah, me too, give me droids over this prison scum.

Clone Guard 1: After what just happened up there, we'll need more room in here.

Clone Guard 2: You can say that again.

Clone Guard 1: Here, I'll send these to the cremation center.

The PODS fly downward.

Clone Guard 3: Hey, wait, it looks like a couple of them are showing vital signs.

Clone Guard 4: All right, I'll check it out.

CLONE GUARD 4 opens up the POD containing CAD BANE and gets ATTACKED. Using the CLONE as a SHIELD, CAD BANE gets his hands on a BLASTER. He SHOOTS two GUARDS. OBI-WAN subdues a GUARD, but has a chance to SHOOT him. HE hesitates and the GUARD presses the ALARM. CAD BANE shoots the GUARD.

Cad Bane: What's the matter with you?

Obi-Wan: My blaster jammed.

Cad Bane: Let's go!

They ESCAPE, CAD BANE shooting GUARDS as they go. THEY reach the HANGER and FIGHT their way into a SHIP.

Cut to:

The STOLEN SHIP is docked in a SAFE PLACE. They ALL exit the SHIP and QUICKLY move to another, stealing that one right from under the nose of a MAN.

Cad Bane: Soon as we're off Coruscant, we're safe.

Then, with no warning, CAD BANE punches OBI-WAN in the JAW.

Cad Bane: That's for hesitating during the escape.

Obi-Wan: If it wasn't for me, we'd still be stuck in there.

Cad Bane: Yeah, funny how that worked out.

Man: Hey, my ship! Come back here!

Moralo: You did well in there, Hardeen. Maybe there's a place for you in my plans after all.

Obi-Wan: I'm listening.



Ep 16 - Friends and Enemies

Narrator: Fugitives on the run! Disguised as Jedi killer Rako Hardeen, Obi-Wan Kenobi works undercover to solve a Separatist plot against Chancellor Palpatine. Obi-Wan meets the plot's mastermind, Moralo Eval, breaking him out of jail to gain his trust. But now, Kenobi faces another obstacle, bounty hunter Cad Bane. Can Obi-Wan Kenobi overcome Bane's suspicions? Or will the ruthless criminal see through his disguise and expose the Jedi? Only time will tell.

OBI-WAN KENOBI, CAD BANE, and MORALO EVAL are in their ship. OBI-WAN, disguised as RAKO HARDEEN, is flying. An ALARM is ringing.

Cad Bane: We're coming in too fast, Hardeen. Are you trying to kill us?

Obi-Wan: They'll be waiting for us at every space port. We have to ditch the ship.

Moralo Eval: You mean you're going to intentionally crash us into the swamp?

Obi-Wan: Yeah, that is exactly what I'm gonna do.

Cad Bane: He's right. We have no choice.

Obi-Wan: Get ready for a fast exit.

The viewport of the SHIP is shown; there is enough fog to obscure the view entirely. The screen changes to show the SHIP disappearing into the fog until it is no longer visible. In the next shot, the SHIP is shown dragging over branches; it gets spun and torn apart. It sinks into the swamp.



Cut to:

OBI-WAN stands on top of the ship, which is now halfway swallowed up by the swamp. CAD BANE, followed by MAROLO EVAL, crawls out of the top hatch OBI-WAN presumably used to get out before them. 

Obi-Wan: Nobody can trace us here. The swamp will swallow up the ship.

Moralo Eval: So we leave no trace of our crash. Moralo Eval likes a man who plans ahead.

MORALO EVAL walks past OBI-WAN, who follows him with CAD BANE.

Cad Bane: You do have a plan?

Obi-Wan: Yeah, I know Nal Hutta. We can get a new ship at the Bilbousa Bazaar, but this time, we buy one. Otherwise, we'll have the authorities back on our tail.

Cad Bane: Not so fast. We need to ditch these prison fatigues. We'll have a bounty on our heads for escaping and I don't like to stand out.

They start walking. 

The camera cuts to the three of them in the town. There are GUARDS eyeing them up.

Moralo Eval: That's local security. Keep moving.

Cad Bane: We'll get some new gear and equipment. Pablo's Pawn Shop has everything a bounty hunter needs and more.



Cut to:

PABLO’S PAWN SHOP, full of shelves of various items. A TWI’LEK WOMAN carries a box through the store. CAD BANE is perusing hats.

Cad Bane: Now all I need's a new hat.

Obi-Wan: For trying to blend in, your hat sure makes you stand out.

OBI-WAN is perusing helmets. He picks one up.

Cad Bane: [POINTEDLY] I don't like to hide under a helmet.

PABLO, the shop owner and a Rodian male, approaches CAD BANE. 

Pablo: Is there anything else you desire? A new ship?

Cad Bane: Your choice of weapons is lousy, Pablo.

PABLO is very close to CAD BANE. CAD BANE pushes him away with his arm. 

Cad Bane: Where can I get some quality blasters?

Pablo: I wouldn't be too picky, being on the run like you obviously are.

CAD BANE has a toothpick in his mouth. He takes it out with one hand, and with the other shoves PABLO up against the wall as the TWI’LEK WOMAN rounds the corner. CAD BANE points the toothpick under PABLO’s neck, and the TWI’LEK WOMAN covers her mouth with her hands in shock. PABLO gags and whimpers in fear.

Cad Bane: I'd keep my mouth shut if I were you, Pablo. We'll get our weapons elsewhere.

The TWI’LEK WOMAN pleads CAD BANE to stop in her native language. He does, and PABLO collapses to the ground, holding his throat. CAD BANE does not notice or care, and begins to walk out of PABLO’S PAWN SHOP. After CAD BANE passes OBI-WAN, OBI-WAN makes a gesture as if he is wondering why CAD BANE had to do that. 

Cad Bane: Thanks for the hat.

CAD BANE and MAROLO EVAL exit PABLO’S PAWN SHOP. OBI-WAN sticks behind for a moment and gives the TWI’LEK WOMAN a few credits.

Obi-Wan: For your trouble.



Cut to: 

OBI-WAN, CAD BANE, and MORALO EVAL are walking away from PABLO’S PAWN SHOP.

Obi-Wan: That trader's heard worse threats than yours, Bane. Probably calling the Hutts right now, seeing what kind of bounty there is on us.

Cad Bane: Relax. On this slime-pool, everybody's an outlaw. Besides, they'll be looking for three of us. So we're splitting up. You find a ship, we'll get weapons.

Obi-Wan: Not so fast. If it's all the same to you, I'll get the weapons.

Cad Bane: It's not the same to me. You crashed the ship, you get us a new one.

Moralo Eval: It does seem fair.

CAD BANE and MORALO EVAL walk away from OBI-WAN. As soon as they are out of earshot, CAD BANE speaks.

Cad Bane: Soon as we have a ship, we ditch Hardeen.

Moralo Eval: Really?

Cad Bane: We'll throw him to the Hutts. While they interrogate him, we'll be long gone.

Moralo Eval: Tell me, is this business or personal?

Cad Bane: Both.



Cut to:

OBI-WAN on a NAL HUTTA SHIPYARD, speaking to a TRADER about buying a SHIP.

Obi-Wan: No, no, no. That's my final offer.

The TRADER replies in their native language, which OBI-WAN can presumably understand. He WALKS underneath the SHIP he has just bought and sticks a TRACKING BEACON to it. When he comes out of the other side, the TRADER speaks to him again.

Obi-Wan: All right then, it's a deal.

TRADER says something, then OBI-WAN notices MORALO EVAL and CAD BANE returning.

Obi-Wan: Good timing. Soon as you pay for the ship, we can get moving.

Moralo Eval: With pleasure.

MORALO EVAL pays the TRADER. OBI-WAN turns to speak to CAD BANE.

Obi-Wan: Hey, where's my weapon?

Cad Bane: Won't need it. You're not coming.

Obi-Wan: Says who?

MORALO EVAL and CAD BANE start to enter the ship while OBI-WAN looks on.

Moralo Eval: He doesn't want to split his fee for breaking me out of prison. And also, he despises you.

OBI-WAN gets closer to the boarding ramp.

Obi-Wan: All I know is I'm not going anywhere without my reward.

Moralo Eval: I'm sorry. This is between you two.

MORALO EVAL steps into the ship to leave OBI-WAN and CAD BANE to talk it out.

Obi-Wan: What's it gonna be, Bane?

They are interrupted by the TWI’LEK WOMAN from PABLO’S PAWN SHOP, who is yelling and pointing at them while caressing PABLO’s face. She is followed by some GUARDS, as she presumably has reported them to the closest thing Nal Hutta has for a police force.

Cad Bane: Here's your reward, I'm not killing you.

CAD BANE sprays OBI-WAN in the face with a green gas, and then kicks him off the boarding ramp. 

The camera switches to OBI-WAN’s point of view. The world looks hazy. He is on the ground, surrounded by the TWI’LEK WOMAN, the GUARDS, and PABLO. A GUARD raises his staff and then brings it down. The screen goes black. OBI-WAN has been knocked out. 



Cut to:

An establishing shot of NAL HUTTA. The TWI’LEK WOMAN can be heard whooping as her SPEEDER passes by. The CAMERA follows a few other speeders and then jumps to the inside of a CELL. OBI-WAN is unconscious, suspended upside down from the ceiling. He wakes up.

Obi-Wan: Where am I?

Cell Guard: You're a guest of the Hutts. If you do not answer my questions about your two partners, we will not be so hospitable.

Obi-Wan: You call this hospitable?

The CELL GUARD twirls his staff menacingly.

Obi-Wan: Wait. Torture won't be necessary. My partners double-crossed me, but I put a tracking device on their ship. Let me down and I'll tell you the frequency.

The CELL GUARD nods at another GUARD manning a torture device. The GUARD pulls a lever, and OBI-WAN collapses to the ground, headfirst.

Cell Guard: Now tell us the tracking frequency.



Cut to: 

MORALO EVAL is on his SHIP. He is talking to COUNT DOOKU via COMM and has still not quite left NAL HUTTA.

Moralo Eval: Yes, Count Dooku. I'm sorry I was delayed. I'm free now. I'll try to reach Serenno as soon as possible.

Dooku: No more excuses, Eval. Time is running short.

Moralo Eval: Yes, Count Dooku, no more excuses.

COUNT DOOKU hangs up. MORALO EVAL joins CAD BANE in the cockpit.

Cad Bane: You said it yourself, Eval. You're free now. I want my money.

Moralo Eval: After the weapons and the ship, I have very few credits left. You'll be paid when we reach Serenno.

The ship rumbles, and an ALARM starts to blare in MORALO EVAL and CAD BANE’s ship. The lights also start flashing red. SMOKE is coming out of the back of the ship. They’ve been HIT. Three SHIPS are behind, firing at them.

Moralo Eval: What is this? Who is attacking us?

Cad Bane: The Hutts!

Moralo Eval: How did they find us so quickly?

Cad Bane: Hardeen, trying to even the score. The engines are fried, we'll have to turn back.



Cut to:

OBI-WAN’s CELL. OBI-WAN hangs from the ceiling again. The CELL GUARD listens to a report from his COMM with the other GUARD who let down OBI-WAN earlier. 

Hutt Enforcer: [OVER COMM] Their ship will crash soon on Nal Hutta. Be there to capture the fugitives.

Obi-Wan: You found the ship like I said. Our deal was you'd let me go now.

Cell Guard: The deal has changed.

OBI-WAN is not pleased about this. Fortunately, the CELL GUARD turns his back on OBI-WAN, who uses the FORCE to release himself from the ceiling. He lands stealthily and grabs the CELL GUARD’s STAFF. The CELL GUARD holds OBI-WAN’s HELMET in his hands. OBI-WAN slams the bottom of the STAFF against the floor, and the CELL GUARD turns around. OBI-WAN knocks him out with the staff, grabs his HELMET, and puts it on, escaping the CELL.

The camera cuts to OBI-WAN, with his helmet on, running through the city, escaping the Hutts. He climbs up onto the ROOF of a building.

Obi-Wan: This is Ben. I apologize for being out of communication, but the situation was rather tenuous. Although, it now appears things may be on track soon. 

The scene changes from OBI-WAN to his HOLOGRAM in the ROOM where MACE WINDU and YODA are watching the COMM.

Obi-Wan: [VIA COMM] Here's what I need, have the bounty on us removed. If I can win over Cad Bane, I can learn more about Eval's plot. But there can be no more complications. So no matter what reports you hear, do not contact me or send help.

A beat.

Obi-Wan: [VIA COMM] And one more thing, I shall need enough credits to buy a new ship.



Cut to?:

[This is the only scene I could not find online. I don’t have Disney+ so this is my best guess at who is speaking, but the words are accurate.]

Palpatine?: Why are you removing the bounty on the three fugitives? 

Mace Windu?: If they're free to move, they could lead us back to Eval's operation.

Palpatine?: Very well. Keep me apprised.



Cut to:

CHANCELLOR PALPATINE and ANAKIN SKYWAKER sit in the CHANCELLOR’S OFFICE. 

Palpatine: You look troubled, Anakin.

Anakin: How can they expect me to just sit here and do nothing with Obi-Wan's murderer on the loose?

Palpatine: It is possible that they do not trust you to control your feelings.

Anakin: Hardeen killed my master, my best friend! And now he's escaping with Cad Bane and Moralo Eval, and the Jedi Council won't do anything about it!

Palpatine: I have it from a reliable source that the fugitives were last headed towards Nal Hutta. You cannot deny your feelings, Anakin. They are what make you special. If you believe you can stop this plot against me, I trust you.

Anakin: Thank you, Chancellor. You won't regret this.

ANAKIN is halfway out the door before PALPATINE speaks. He does not hear PALPATINE.

Palpatine: No. I won't.

Cut to:

MORALO EVAL and CAD BANE are walking in a crowd. They have not yet left NAL HUTTA. CAD BANE stops MORALO EVAL and points up toward a figure sitting at a table. It is OBI-WAN, still disguised as RAKO HARDEEN. Upon seeing CAD BANE and MORALO EVAL, OBI-WAN salutes them with a MARTINI GLASS in his hand. 

Obi-Wan: Oh, back so soon? Let me guess? You missed me?

Moralo Eval: Watch it!

Obi-Wan: Kill me and you won't get off Nal Hutta.

Moralo Eval: Moralo Eval is running out of time and patience.

Cad Bane: Let the man talk.

Obi-Wan: Look, I've got a ship. You've got the Hutts on your tail, so you make me a partner in everything.

Moralo Eval: [SIGHS] Your deal is accepted.

Cad Bane: No. First I wanna know where you got the credits to buy a ship.

Obi-Wan: You thought you left me for dead, but the Hutts owed me a favor.

Cad Bane: So you had them shoot us down?

Obi-Wan: You would've done the same thing, Bane. The way I see it, we're even now.

Moralo Eval: Now that we're all friends, get me off this festering stink-hole.

OBI-WAN, CAD BANE, and MORALO EVAL walk away from OBI-WAN’s table as a WAITER comes up to it.

Waiter: Wait, who's going to pay for this mess?

The WAITER is ignored.

Obi-Wan: So about your fee from Eval, a 50/50 split sounds fair to me.

Cad Bane: Over my dead corpse.

Obi-Wan: Don't tempt me.



Cut to:

A SHIP lands on NAL HUTTA. When its landing ramp drops down, ANAKIN SKYWALKER and AHSOKA TANO walk out of it. 

Ahsoka: What makes you think Obi-Wan's murderer is on Nal Hutta?

Anakin: I got a tip from the Chancellor himself.

Ahsoka: How are we gonna find them?

Anakin: Ahsoka, you should know by now. If you want to find a lowlife...

Ahsoka: You start at the saloon.



Cut to:

ANAKIN SKYWALKER and AHSOKA TANO walk into a SALOON with two GUARDS at its entrance. As they enter, TWO TWI’LEK WOMEN walk out, a SUITOR between them. 

Suitor: Hey, ladies, where are we going next? I love you guys.

Inside the SALOON, there are more GUARDS. They make to block ANAKIN and AHSOKA from entering, but ANAKIN uses the FORCE to throw a GUARD’s KNIFE away, barely missing a PATRON and hitting the wall of the SALOON. The rest of the PATRONS cheer at the spectacle. ANAKIN and AHSOKA approach the BAR.

Bartender: The fugitives are already gone.

Anakin: All three of them were here?

Bartender: Two came in, met the third.

Anakin: When did they leave?

Bartender: Nothing's free on Nal Hutta, especially information.

ANAKIN mildly FORCE CHOKES the BARTENDER.

Anakin: I don't have time for games.

Bartender: [GAGGING] You just missed them.

Anakin: [MENACINGLY] Keep talking.

Bartender: I heard one of them say they just bought a ship.

ANAKIN releases the BARTENDER from the FORCE CHOKE. The BARTENDER slams into the counter of the SALOON, and ANAKIN turns away.

Anakin: Let's go, Snips.



Cut to:

An establishing shot of the SENATE BUILDING onCORUSCANT. Inside of it, CLONE CAPTAIN REX gets a COMM call from MACE WINDU. 

Mace Windu: Captain Rex, I need to speak with General Skywalker. He's not responding to my calls.

Rex: Sir, General Skywalker is unavailable.

Mace Windu: Where is he, Captain?

The DOORS behind REX OPEN to reveal CHANCELLOR PALPATINE with MAS AMEDDA, who are exiting CHANCELLOR PALPATINE’S OFFICE. 

Rex: I can't say, sir.

Mace Windu: You can't or you won't?

CHANCELLOR PALPATINE decides to insert himself into the conversation.

Palpatine: Anakin is on Nal Hutta.

Mace Windu: Nal Hutta?

Palpatine: Protecting me is only postponing the problem, not solving it.

Mace Windu: With all due respect, Chancellor, the Council has a plan in place.

Palpatine: Yes, and so does Moralo Eval, who appears to be several steps ahead of you. For that reason, I asked Anakin to take action. 

The scene changes from REX and PALPATINE’s side of the CALL to MACE WINDU’s side of the CALL. He is taking it in the same ROOM he received OBI-WAN’s CALL in earlier. 

Palpatine: He is confident he can find the fugitives and stop this plot against me. I suggest you have more faith in young Skywalker. Captain, if you must escort me home, I'm leaving now.

Rex: Yes, sir.

REX hangs up the call. MACE WINDU turns to address YODA, who is also in the ROOM.

Mace Windu: This is exactly what Obi-Wan didn't want to happen. If I warn him, it could blow his cover, get him killed.

Yoda: Kill Hardeen, Skywalker might. Or die trying, he may. Warn them both, you must. Overdue, the truth is.



Cut to:

ANAKIN SKYWALKER is standing in the SHIPYARD on NAL HUTTA with the TRADER that OBI-WAN bought a SHIP from earlier. The TRADER is speaking to ANAKIN in his native language, presumably about the location of OBI-WAN, CAD BANE, and MORALO EVAL.

Anakin: How do you know they couldn't have gotten very far?

The TRADER replies in their native language.

Anakin: So you only gave them enough fuel to reach the nearest filling station on Orondia, which is owned by your brother?

ANAKIN tosses the TRADER a credit chip. He laughs, and the TRADER laughs with him.

Anakin: Well, that's a nice little money-making scam.

ANAKIN walks over to AHSOKA TANO, who is waiting at the edge of the shipyard.

Ahsoka: We better get going. Orondia's pretty deserted. They may steal a ship there, to throw us off their trail.

Anakin: I like your thinking.



Cut to:

A FILLING STATION on ORONDIA. The TRADER’S BROTHER is having a conversation with MORALO EVAL.

Moralo Eval: Here, take it. I just want to get out of here.

MORALO EVAL pays the TRADER’S BROTHER, who waves at him. MORALO EVAL walks back to his ship, where CAD BANE and OBI-WAN wait.

Moralo Eval: We're being swindled. Who sells a ship with only enough fuel to get to this lousy rock?

Cad Bane: The way I see it, you keep paying off everybody but me.

Obi-Wan: Yeah, why is that?

The three of them begin to climb back into their SHIP.



Cut to:

A SHIP flies into ORONDIA’s orbit. When it gets near to the FILLING STATION, AHSOKA TANO and ANAKIN SKYWALKER are shown sitting in the copilot and pilot seats, respectively. AHSOKA looks out of its viewport and spots CAD BANE, OBI-WAN, and MORALO EVAL getting into their ship.

Ahsoka: Look! It's Cad Bane.

Anakin: Are you sure?

Ahsoka: Ugh, who else wears a hat like that?

Anakin: Good point.

OBI-WAN, CAD BANE, and MORALO EVAL’s SHIP closes its boarding ramp and takes off. ANAKIN begins to follow them. ANAKIN smirks, and uses his SHIP to BUMP the top of CAD BANE, OBI-WAN, and MORALO EVAL’s SHIP.

Moralo Eval: Now what?

Cad Bane: Jedi!

A CHASE ensues, ANAKIN tormenting the other SHIP and its riders with various tricks and maneuvers.

Anakin: Take over! I'll bring them down!

ANAKIN gets up, leaving AHSOKA to man their SHIP. ANAKIN exits his SHIP and jumps onto the other SHIP. OBI-WAN sees him land through the viewport.

Obi-Wan: I'll take care of him.

Cad Bane: No! It's my turn to kill a Jedi!

CAD BANE leaves the cockpit, and OBI-WAN looks hesitant to let him go. 

The camera switches to ANAKIN, stabbing his LIGHTSABER through the SHIP’s hull, then to CAD BANE exiting his SHIP using his rocket boots. CAD BANE swings underneath the SHIP to its other side using a grappling magnet. He SHOOTS his PISTOL at ANAKIN, who reflects the SHOTS with his LIGHTSABER. A reflected SHOTS hits one of CAD BANE’s rocket boots, causing him to fall back onto the outside of the SHIP. CAD BANE continues to use a PISTOL to SHOOT at ANAKIN, who moves closer as he uses his LIGHTSABER to reflect the SHOTS.

CAD BANE and ANAKIN continue fighting, and AHSOKA rams her SHIP against OBI-WAN’s several times. OBI-WAN shoots the PIPES that line the ground beneath them to cause SMOKE and EXPLOSIONS, and makes several moves that cause ANAKIN and CAD BANE to stumble. 

One of the SHOTS that OBI-WAN makes clouds AHSOKA’s view. When the SMOKE clears, there is a low ARC in front of her that she flies over, while OBI-WAN flies under it. OBI-WAN jerks his controls upward and HITS AHSOKA’s SHIP, causing both her SHIP and OBI-WAN’s to CRASH as well as ANAKIN and CAD BANE to fall off of OBI-WAN’s SHIP onto the ground.

AHSOKA, OBI-WAN, and MORALO EVAL are knocked out.

The first one to WAKE UP is OBI-WAN, in his SHIP. An ALARM is beeping, and OBI-WAN rubs his head as if it hurts.

Obi-Wan: Anakin.

OBI-WAN exits his SHIP in a hurry, drawing his BLASTER but looking for ANAKIN in the SMOKE and DUST of their CRASH. 

The camera cuts to AHSOKA, who also AWAKENS, rubs her head, and moves out of the cockpit.

The camera returns to OBI-WAN, still looking for ANAKIN, who after a minute, TACKLES him to the ground unexpectedly. OBI-WAN pushes ANAKIN off of himself, and they both stand up.

Anakin: You're going to pay for what you did.

ANAKIN goes to PUSH OBI-WAN, who resists.

Obi-Wan: You shouldn't have gotten involved.

They GRAPPLE, and ANAKIN smashes OBI-WAN into a rock wall, then KNEES him. OBI-WAN collapses onto the ground, and ANAKIN ignites his LIGHTSABER.

Anakin: This is for Obi-Wan.

Right before ANAKIN is about to SWING, CAD BANE is seen on the top of the rock wall, and he shoots a CORD at ANAKIN that wraps around ANAKIN’s LIMBS. 

Cad Bane: You can thank me later, Hardeen.

CAD BANE uses the CORD and his one remaining rocket boot to drag ANAKIN away from OBI-WAN. 

Cad Bane: You had your chance to kill him. Now it's my turn.

ANAKIN flips over and KICKS CAD BANE, then uses the FORCE to draw his LIGHTSABER into his hand. CAD BANE SHOOTS at ANAKIN, who reflects the SHOTS. 

The camera cuts to AHSOKA, who uses Force acrobatics to climb up some PIPES to a vantage point. She can see ANAKIN and CAD BANE fighting, but she cannot reach them easily, as there is a CHASM between them and herself. 

The camera returns to ANAKIN and CAD BANE, still fighting. ANAKIN reflects a SHOT into CAD BANE’s BLASTER, causing him to lose it. As he is about to cut through CAD BANE, OBI-WAN TACKLES ANAKIN to the ground. Both of them recover quickly, and OBI-WAN uses hand-to-hand combat skills to FIGHT with ANAKIN. They SCUFFLE for a bit until OBI-WAN gets ANAKIN into a headlock.

Obi-Wan: [WHISPERING] Anakin, don't follow me.

ANAKIN’s EYES widen as if in realization, then roll back. He has PASSED OUT. OBI-WAN releases ANAKIN onto the ground and stands up. CAD BANE retrieves his blaster and points it at ANAKIN. As he SHOOTS, AHSOKA jumps in to deflect the SHOT. She stands over ANAKIN’S BODY and defends him until MORALO EVAL walks over and there is a cease fire.

Moralo Eval: The ship is still operational. I got it working. Now let's get out of here.

MORALO EVAL runs back to the SHIP.

Cad Bane: You're lucky we're in a hurry, little lady. We'll have to dance another time.

CAD BANE tips his hat to AHSOKA, then he goes to the SHIP, OBI-WAN following after a moment’s hesitation. After a beat, AHSOKA deactivates her LIGHTSABERS and bends down to check on ANAKIN, who is still PASSED OUT.

Ahsoka: Master! Master, are you all right?

ANAKIN stirs, groaning and coughing. AHSOKA helps him sit up and then stand while OBI-WAN’s SHIP takes off with CAD BANE and MORALO EVAL. ANAKIN falls to one knee.

Ahsoka: What is it? What's wrong?

Anakin: That's why I felt a connection. Obi-Wan is still alive.

Ahsoka: I don't understand.

Anakin: I don't, either. But we're gonna get to the bottom of this. Believe me.

AHSOKA helps ANAKIN stand again, and they start to hobble toward their fallen SHIP. The camera zooms out. Fade to black. 



Ep 1 - Revival

[Camera pans in, Domino squad, back facing the camera, is in smoke]

[Rex begins to give his speech from the Rookies Episode, fade to shot of Rex’s helmet]



Rex: The name's Rex. But you'll call me Captain or sir. War does not come with a guarantee. No soldier gets the promise of safety
Fives: My designation is trooper 27-5555, sir.
Hevy: We call him Fives. I'm Hevy. This is Echo.
Cody: I’m Commander Cody, your new boss
Domino Squad: Sir! Yes Sir!
Rex: Looks like we got ourselves a batch of shinies, Commander.
Fives: Look around, we’re one and the same, same heart, same blood, your training is in your blood, and my blood’s boiling for a fight.
*Various Clones Yelling* *Battle Noises*
Echo: ...This is our war!
[Camera begins to pan out from Rex’s helmet, it’s in the middle between two rows of helmets, Wolff, Hawk and Cody’s helmets are all shown, camera keeps zooming out faster, showing the evolution from the Phase 1 Clone trooper helmets, more personalized, to the Phase 2 Pre-Stormtrooper helmets, all uniform in color, then an artillery shell blows up the back of the row of helmets, the shockwave destroying the rest of the row and the screen turns orange]

[On screen: A war left unfinished … Until now]

[Gunship flies into Fort Anaxes, where the forces of the Republic are amassing for war, the camera pans past platoons of clones, AT-TEs and more gunships.]

[Anakin walks out of the hangar, with Rex on his right and Hunter from the Bad Batch on his left, shot pans around their backs to a fleet of Venator-class Star Destroyers in the sky, ready to depart]

[Clone Wars Logo appears on screen]

[A door inside the base opens to reveal an older Anakin (RoS outfit) walking in with Obi-Wan behind him, they’ve been summoned by Rex, behind them are officers in Imperial-esque uniforms]

Anakin: Alright, Rex, what’s so important that you brought us aaaall the way back here?
[Rex looks at Anakin, in view is a hologram of an older Ahsoka,back towards the camera, next to Bo-Katan Kryze in her Nite Owl armor, Ahsoka slowly turns around, Bo follows]

Ahsoka: Hello master, it’s been awhile
[On screen: “#clonewarssaved” in title text, trailer ends]


Ep 1 - The Bad Batch
- Narrator: The battle for Anaxes! One of the Republic's largest shipyards is under attack from Admiral Trench's Separatist forces. Jedi Generals Mace Windu and Anakin Skywalker lead a two-pronged assault on the ground and in the air. But after weeks of heated battle and mounting losses, the Republic's grip on Anaxes begins to slip away...

- Mace Windu: The droids have overrun our main production facility. It won't be long before the Separatists take Anaxes, compromising our entire reserve fleet. [As him and Anakin overlook a holo-projector of the shipyard on Anaxes]

- Cody: Pardon the interruption General, but Rex here has a good theory on why we keep losing.

- Mace Windu: Please, Captain.

- Rex: Well the Droid Army uses analytics to predict our strategy. The first time we use a tactic it's very effective, the next, less so. In fact, the more we use a certain tactic, the less effective it becomes. They learn our tendencies, and use that data against us. To counter them, we're constantly out working ways to vary our attack.

- Mace Windu: But the losses we're experiencing on Anaxes are not commonplace.

- Rex: Exactly! The counter attacks are so specific, it's my strategy the droids know, my playbook.

- Cody: My concern is that Rex is one of our best. If the droids can learn to defeat him, we may all be vulnerable.

- Mace Windu: What do you propose?

- Cody: That Rex and me take a small squad behind enemy lines. There's a Separatist Cybercenter which relays all battlefield intel to their command ship. If we're going to find anything, it'll be there.

- Mace Windu: If you think it'll help turn this fight around, get going.

- Anakin Skywalker: Rex, is there anything else?

- Rex: No General.


[Cody and Rex make their way out of the conference room, where we cut to Rex present in the barracks, alone]

- Cody: C'mon Rex, time to move out.

- Rex: Fives, Echo, and before that, Hevy. So many troopers, gone. [As he mournfully looks at a picture of him, Cody, Fives, and Echo]

- Cody: Yeah, regular folk don't understand: Sometimes in war, it's hard to be the one that survives.

- Rex: That's what I'm worried about.

- Cody: What do you mean?

- Rex: I didn't tell the generals, they might think I'm crazy, in fact, you might think I'm crazy.

- Cody: What is it?

- Rex: I think Echo's alive.

- Cody: That's not possible. He died at the Citadel.

- Rex: The way the droids are countering us here, the strategies I'm using, they're all old battle plans Echo and I drew up together.

- Cody: Look, Rex, I here what you're saying, but it's just not possible.

- Rex: I hope you're right. But the fact is, Echo's fingerprints are all over these Separatist strategies.

- Cody: Rex, you have to admit what you're saying is a longshot at best, and most likely, misplaced hope. I need you to be focused on this.

- Rex: I-I know, I know. Don't worry. So, what squad are we taking in?

- Cody: Clone Force 99. [As he walks out of the barracks]

- Jesse (to Kix): I heard mixed feelings about these guys. [As he and Kix are waiting outside the barracks]

- Kix: They have a 100% success rate. - Jesse: It's not that they win, it's how they win that worries me.

- Air Traffic Control Personnel (Loudspeaker): Repeat, coming in hot on platform TT-397.

- ATC Personnel (Loudspeaker): Clear the airfield! I said clear the airfield! [As an unknown shuttle flies into the airfield recklessly]

- Rex (to Cody): So why haven't I heard of this squad? [Making his way to the parked shuttle along with Cody, Jesse, and Kix]

- Cody: Experimental unit: Clone Force 99. The defective clones with uh, desirable mutations.

- Rex: 99 hey? Nice touch. - Cody: They call themselves: "The Bad Batch."

[The main door opens, as the Bad Batch step out of their ship]

- Wrecker: The cavalry has arrived!

- Kix (to Jesse): These guys are clones? They don't look like clones to me.

- Cody: Sergeant, good to see you again.

- Hunter: You too, sir.

- Cody (to Rex, Jesse, and Kix): This is Hunter.

- Hunter: Sorry we're late Commander. We were putting down an insurrection on Yalbec Prime when your comm came in. Had a few unforeseen, complications.

- Wrecker (to Jesse): (Laughs) Ever fought a male Yalbec?

- Jesse: Um, no. Can't say I have.

- Wrecker: You're lucky. They only way to kill them is with one of these: [Holds up a vibroblade]

- Hunter: That's right. Wrecker here cut off the Queen's stinger while she was still alive. That's why all those Yalbec males tried to eat us.

- Tech: Uh, technically, they were trying to mate with us. And for your information: The stinger of a Yalbec Queen is a delicacy on some planets.

- Cody: They call him "Tech."

- Hunter: Yeah, he can fill your head with useless info for hours. Crosshair on the other hand is not much of a conversationalist [pointing at Crosshair], but when you have to hit a precise target from 10 clicks, Crosshair's your man. So Commander, what kind of suicide mission do you have for us this time?

- Cody: Let's get goin', we'll brief you on the way. [The team proceeds to get on an LAAT gunship]

- Jesse (to Crosshair): What are you looking at? [Both staring at each other sternly]

- Crosshair: We don't usually work with "regs." [Flicking his toothpick at Jesse]

- Jesse: "Regs?" [Proceeding to confront Crosshair]

- Hunter: He's talking about "regular clones." But don't take it personal.

- Cody: We're all on the same team, so cut the attitude and listen up. Here's the mission: Our target is this Cybercenter [Holding up a hologram of the Cybercenter]. It's the brains of the entire Separatist campaign here on Anaxes.

- Wrecker: I can demolish that with one hand! Yeah!

- Cody: This isn't a demo job Wrecker. It's strictly a retrieval operation.

- B1 Battle Droid (to Sector 1): Sector 1 alert: Enemy gunship approaching your location. Come in Sector 1. [Spotting the LAAT gunship en route to the Cybercenter]

- B1 Battle Droid (at Sector 1): Roger Roger. Fire! [Upon seeing the gunship in range]

- Clone Pilot: Incoming fire! [As the spider droids start shooting at their ship]

- Wrecker: We're going down! (Laughs) [As the damaged gunship plummets towards the surface]

- Wrecker: We always get shot down when we travel with regs! [As the he and the squad pull themselves out of the crashed ship]

- Kix: Cody! Help! He's trapped! [Seeing Cody trapped inside the ship]

- Rex: We have to do something! I'll get him.

- Hunter: Whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa, easy Captain. Wrecker, get 'im out.
